src_text: Merero ye Bohlokwa Seemong sa Bjale.
tgt_text: Lulawulo lwenhlekelele ngemuva kwetikhukhula.

src_text: Taolo ya Masetlapelo Morago ga Mafula.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ivakalisa kudzabuka kwayo kubo bonkhe bantfu labalahlekelwe tihlobo tabo labatitsandzako kuletikhukhula letidale umonakalo letisandza kwenteka letikhahlamete tincenye letinyeti telive letfu, ikakhulu KwaZulu-Natal..     Kumenyetelwa kwetingenelelo tekuhhamula Simo Savelonkhe Senhlekelele netingenelelo tetenhlalomnotfo letisandza kumenyetelwa nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, kuhloswe ngato kucinisekisa kuphendvula lokuhlanganisiwe nalokunemphumelelo kuyo yonkhe imikhakha yahulumende, ngekusebentisa Sikhungo Savelonkhe Sekulawula Tenhlekelele.

src_text: Kabinete lebišitše mahloko yona go batho ka moka bao ba lobilego bao ba phelago le bona mo mafuleng go setla pelo malobanyana ao wetšego dikarolo tša naga ya gaborena, kudukudu KwaZulu-Natal..     Tsebagatšo ya Maemo Masetlapelo Bosetšhaba gotee le magato kimollo ya ikonomi maphelong batho ao tsebagaditšwego ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa malobanyana mo be nepile go netefatša kgato ye nago le mohola le ya go rulaganywa ka tsela ye maleba go potologa didiko ka moka ka mmušo, ka Senthara ya Bosetšhaba ya Taolo ya Masetlapelo..     R1 bilione ya go tlišwa ke mmušo gare šomišwa go thekga maitekelo kimollo le go boetša seemo sekeng, go bušetša ditirelo tša motheo sekeng le go fana ka thušo ya botho ka sebopego sa dijo, madulo, tlhwekišo le diaparo..     Tshepedišo ya go agaleswa mafelo ao amilwego ke mafula šetše thomile ka ge batho ba naga ya gaborena ba ipopa ngatana ye tee ka maikemišetšo go thuša bao ba lobilego magae le dithoto tša bona.
tgt_text: Sigidzigidzi sinye semarandi hulumende lasente kutsi sitfolakale sisetjentiselwa kwesekela kuhhamula nemitamo yekuvusetela kabusha, kubuyisela esimeni tinsita letisisekelo kanye nekuniketa lusito lwebuntfu ngendlela yekudla, emanti, kuhanjiswa kwekungcola kanye netimphahla tekugcoka.

src_text: Tsebišo ya Seemo sa Bolwetši bja Coronavirus (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Lenchubo yekwakha kabusha tindzawo letitsintsekile seyivele icalile njengaloku bantfu belive lakitsi babumbana ekuncumeni kutsi basite labo labalahlekelwe ngemakhaya abo naloko labanako.

src_text: Kabinete hlobaetšwa ke tlhatlogo ya bjale ya diphetelo tša COVID-19 dikarolong tše dingwe tša naga ya gaborena ebile hlohleleditše batho ka moka go latela magato go ihlokomela gore ba itšhireletše kgahlanong le baerase ye ya go iša batho ga maotwanahunyela, kudukudu ka nako ye ya marega.
tgt_text: Lokusha mayelana neSifo seLigciwane leKhorona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Baerase ye santše le tlhobaboroko yeo tšwelago pele ebile meento sale sebetša sa go ba le mohola kudu sa go itšhireletša.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikucaphele ngekukhatsateka kwenyuka lokusandza kwenteka kwelufu lwe-COVID-19 kuletinye tincenye futsi icela bonkhe bantfu kutsi batsatse tinyatselo tekutivikela kuleligciwane lelibulalako, ikakhulu ngalesikhatsi sasebusika.

src_text: Kabinete thabišwa ke gore batho ba bantši ba tšea sephetho sa go hlaba meento bjalo ka mekgwa ya bona ya mathomo ya go itšhireletša kgahlanong le COVID-19 morago ga gore dipalopalo tša moragorago di laetše gore re fihleletše phenyo ya go feta seripa sa meento bathong ba bagolo diprofenseng tše tlhano..     Kabinete dira boipiletšo go bao ba sa kago ba hlaba meento go dira bjalo gore ba itšhireletše le go šireletša bao ba phelago le bona.
tgt_text: Leligciwane solomane lisasenebungoti lobungapheli kantsi kugoma kusikhali lesiyimphumelelo lenkhulu sekutsi sitivikele.

src_text: Re swanetše go tšwelapele go obamela magato ka moka thibelo ya COVID-19, go akaretšwa le go apara maseke wa go pipetša nko le molomo, go hlapa matsogo ka meetse le ka sesepe goba ka go šomiša sanithaesa sa diatla sa go tswakwa ka alekhohole ya go feta 70%, le go šielana sekgala sa go bolokega se ka bago mithara tee..     Thušo ya Tšhelete ya Kimollo ya Masetlapelo Leago (SRD).
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ijabulile kubona bantfu labanyenti bachubeka nekukhetsa kugoma njengendlela yekucala yekutivikela ku-COVID-19 ngemuva kwelubalobalo lolusandza kwentiwa lolukhomba kutsi sesifinyelele ngetulu kwe-50 yemaphesenti ebantfu labadzala lasebagomile etifundzeni letisihlanu..     Ikhabhinethi icela labo labasengakagomi kutsi bagome kute bativikele kanye nalabatsandzekako babo.

src_text: Kabinete hlohleleditše badudi bao ba amogelago Thušo ya tšhelete ya SRD ya R350 go dira dikgopelo gape morago ga gore go tsebagatšwe melao ye meswa ya go laola dikgopelo le maswanedi go hwetša thušo ye ya tšhelete.
tgt_text: Kufanele kutsi sonkhe sichubeke nekugcina tonkhe tinchubo tekutivikela ku-COVID-19, lokufaka ekhatsi kufaka sifonyo lesivala imphumulo nemlomo, sigeze tandla ngemanti nangensipho, nome sisebentise sibulalimagciwane sekugeza tandla lesine-70% ye-alkhoholi, kanye nekugcina libanga lekuchelelana leliphephile lokungenani libe imitha yinye..     Sibonelelo Sahulumende Sekuhhamula Inhlupheko (i-SRD).

src_text: Dikgopelo di ka dirwa wepsaeteng ya Etšensi ya Afrika Borwa ya Tšhireletšego ya Leago (SASSA) mo go https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi igcugcutele takhamuti letitfola sibonelelo sahulumende sekuhhamula inhlupheko kutsi tiphindze futsi tifake ticelo, ngemuva kwekungeniswa kwemitsetfosimiso lemisha lelawula ticelo kanye nekufaneleka kutfola lesibonelelo sahulumende.

src_text: Peakanyo ya dikgopelo butšwe ka la 23 Moranang 2022 ebile ke tshepedišo yeo dirwago ka mokgwa wa titšithale ka moka ga yona go kgontšha gore dikgopelo di dirwe ka bonako..     Thušo ye ya tšhelete ya kimollo ke boikokotlelo bja go bolokega go malapa go ihlokela bao ge nkabe se ka yona ba ka be ba amilwe gampe ke lemena la bohloki le tlhokego ya mešomo.
tgt_text: Ticelo tingafakwa kuwebhusayithi ye-Ejensi Yesibonelelomali yaseNingizimu Afrika (i-SASSA ku: https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.

src_text: Mmušo ikgafetše go fana ka thušo ya leago go bao ba lego kotsing gore le bona ba kgone go fihlelela dinyakwa tša motheo.
tgt_text: Luhlelo lwekufaka ticelo luvulwe mhla tinge-23 Mabasa 2022 kantsi lusebentisa ngalokuphelele inchubo yedijithali kute kutsi kutsatse sikhatsi sekukuphendvula lesiphangisako..     Lesibonelelomali sekuhhamula siyinetha yekuphephela lemcoka yemindeni leswelako lengabe ikhahlabetwe buphuya nekuswela umsebenti.

src_text: Polokego le Tšhireletšego.
tgt_text: Hulumende utimisele kuniketa lusito lwetenhlalo kulabo abahlaseleka lula kakhulu kute kutsi bakhone kuhlangabetana netidzingo tabo letisisekelo.

src_text: Kabinete tšwelapele go sola ka bogale dipolao tša go setla pelo tša basadi ebile amogetše magato bonako ka bahlankedi ba phethagatšo ya molao ge ba kgonne go golega bagononelwa ba go amana le lehu la Mohumagatšana Hillary Gardee (28), wa kua Kamagugu gola Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: Tekuphepha Nekuvikeleka.

src_text: Kabinete sotše gape le polao ya batho ba tshela kua Khayelitsha, Motsekapa.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyachubeka nekuhlaba kubulawa kwabomake lokute ingcondvo futsi iyakwemukela kuphendvula ngekushesha lokwentiwe tiphatsimandla tekucinisekisa kugcinwa kwemtsetfo ngekubamba basolwa labayamaniswa nekufa kwaMk.

src_text: Dipolao tše tša go setla pelo ke segopotšo go rena sa gore re swanetše go dira tšohle bjalo ka setšhaba go fediša dikgaruru ka kakaretšo le dikgaruru tša go ikala ka bong le polao ya basadi (GBVF)..     Kabinete hlohleleditše batho ka moka ka mo nageng go šomišana le mmušo go lwantšha bosenyi le GBVF.
tgt_text: Hillary Gardee (28), waKamagugu eMpumalanga.

src_text: Re le mmogo re ka netefatša gore setšhaba sa gaborena le mebila bolokegile bathong ka moka, go akaretšwa batšofadi, basadi le bana.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ichubeka futsi ngekuhlaba sento sekubulawa kwebantfu labasitfupha eKhayelitsha, eKapa.

src_text: Ikonomi.
tgt_text: Lokubulala lokute ingcondvo kuyinkhumbuto yekutsi kufanele sente kakhulu njengemmango kute sicedze budlova kanye nebudlova lobucondziswe ebulilini lobutsite kanye nekubulawa kwalabasikati (i-GBVF).

src_text: Kabinete amogetše pulo ya semmušo ya fabriki ya go foroma ditena ya Corobrik Kwastina gola Driefontein profenseng ya Gauteng ka Mopresidente Ramaphosa ka Laboraro, 4 Mopitlo.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi igcugcutela bonkhe bantfu lapha eveni kutsi basebentisane nahulumende ekulweni nebugebengu kanye ne-GBVF.

src_text: Faporiki ye ye tšwago pele ka theknolotši ya sebjalebjale bopa karolo ya dipeeletšo tša R800 milione, tša go gata ka mošito tee le dipeeletšo tše dingwe gape tša go lekana R200 milione tšeo go lebeletšwego gore di tla oketša mešomo ya tšweletšo ya lekgwara ka Corobrik gola KwaZulu-Natal.
tgt_text: Ngekubambisana singasenta siciniseko sekutsi imimango yetfu kanye netitaladi tetfu tiphephile kubo bonkhe bantfu, lokufaka ekhatsi bantfu lasebakhulile, bomake nebantfwana.

src_text: Corobrik ke ye nngwe ya dikgwebo tše mmalwa tšeo di phethagaditšego kgoeletšo ya Mopresidente Ramaphosa dikgwebong tša Afrika Borwa le tša boditšhabatšhaba go beeletša ikonoming ye.
tgt_text: Temnotfo.

src_text: Kabinete lemogile gore ikonomi ye fokolago ya haedrotšene tsošološitšwe ge Anglo American tsebagatša lori ya go sepela ka haedrotšene.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikwemukele kuvulwa ngalokusemtsetfweni kwefekthri yekubhaka titini yakwa-Corobriks i-Kwastina lapha eDriefontein eGauteng nguMengameli Ramaphosa ngaLesitsatfu, mhla ti-4 Inkhwekhweti.

src_text: Lori ye yeo go dirilwego diphetogo go yona gore sepele ka haedrotšene go tšwa go disele, le go sepela gape ka dipeteri tša mohuta wa lithium-ion ke ya mathomothomo lefaseng.
tgt_text: Lefekthri lesezingeni lemhlaba yakha incenye yelutjalomali lwetigidzi letinge-R800, loluhamba kanye naletinye tigidzi letinge-R200 letibekelwe kusebenta ngakhonkolo kwe-Corobrik lelapha KwaZulu-Natal.

src_text: Ikonomi ya haedrotšene hlaotšwe bjalo ka yeo tlago pele ga tšohle godimo ga ikonomi ya naga ya borena ya go ikala ka tlhago, le go sepetša kgolo ya ikonomi le tlhomo ya mešomo..     Kabinete amogetše dipeeletšo tše dingwe ka gare ga ikonomi ya gaborena ka khamphani ya dijo ya Ireland ya go bitšwa The Kerry Group, yeo butšego polante ye mpsha ya go bitša R650 milione kua Hammarsdale, KwaZulu-Natal yeo nepilego go tšweletša dijo tša go swarelela nako ye telele kontinenteng.
tgt_text: I-Corobrik ingulenye yemabhizinisi lamanyenti endzawo laphendvulile kulesimemo lesentiwe nguMengameli Ramaphosa kumabhizinisi aseNingizimu Afrika kanye nakumabhizinisi emave emhlaba kutsi atjale timali kulelive..     Ikhabhinethi ikucaphele kutsi lomnotfo lomusha longakhiphi ikhabhoni lenyenti ugcugcutelekile ngesikhatsi kwetfulwa iloli lehamba ngemandla ehayidrojini baka-Anglo American.

src_text: Polante ye ke ya moswananoši ka baka la gore thekga mekgwa ye mmalwa ya go swarelela lebaka le le telele go akaretšwa didirišwa tša tšhomišo ya fase ya enetši, go fehlwa ga mohlagase ka seetša sa letšatši go fokotša tirišo ya mohlagase go tšwa go tšweletšo ya mohlagase ya ka mo nageng, tšhomišo ya phišo ge go fišwa dilahlwa go fehla mohlagase, le mekgwa ya go šoma gabotse ya go ageletša meetse, go šomiša seswa le go fokotša tšhomišo ya ona.
tgt_text: Leloli − lebeyihamba ngedizili yantjintjelwa kutsi ihambe ngehayidrojini, futsi ihamba ngencenye yemandla emabhethri e-lithium-ion – isezingeni lekucala lemhlaba.

src_text: Khamphani ye ya Kerry Group fihlile ka mo Afrika Borwa ka 2011, le gona dipeeletšo tša yona tšeo di tšwelago pele ke sešupo sa gore Afrika Borwa santše le naga ya boikgethelo dipeeletšong.
tgt_text: Umnotfo wehayidrojini ubonakale njengelisubuciko lelibekwe embili kutsi kucalwe ngalo kumnotfo lonekhabhoni lephasi walelive, kanye nekuchubela embili kukhula kutemnotfo nekucashwa..     Ikhabhinethi iphindze futsi yemukela lolunye lutjalomali kumnotfo wetfu lolwentiwe yinkampani yekudla yase-Ireland, i-The Kerry Group, lesungule sikhungomkhicito lesisha setigidzi letinge-R650 lapha eHammarsdale, KwaZulu-Natal lokuhloswe ngaso kutsi kukhicitwe kudla lokusimeme kwalelivekati.

src_text: Dipeeletšo tše di gata mohlaleng wa tsebagatšo ya bene yeo dirilwego ka mo nageng ya Isuzu D-Max gola Gqeberha kua Kapa Bohlabela kgwedi ya go feta.
tgt_text: Lesikhungomkhicito sehlukile ngobe sikhombisa timphawu letinyenti tekusimama lokufaka ekhatsi tisetjentiswa letisebentisa emandla agezi lamancane, kuphehlwa kwemandla elilanga kute kuncishiswe kusetjentiswa kwemandla agezi kugridi yendzawo, konga kulahleka kwekushisa, kanye nekubamba emanti ngemphumelelo, kuwasebentisa futsi nekunciphisa kungcola.

src_text: Mohuta wo moswa wa D-MAX ke seka sa go rweša kgare maikgafo Isuzu ka mo Afrika Borwa ebile ke ye nngwe ya dikatlego tšeo di fihleletšwego ka fase ga Lenaneotlhabollo la Tšweletšo ya Difatanaga (APDP).
tgt_text: I-Kerry Group yafika lapha eNingizimu Afrika kusukela nga-2011, kantsi kuchubeka kwayo nelutjalomali kuluphawu lwekutsi iNingizimu Afrika iyindzawo yelutjalomali longatikhetsela yona.

src_text: Lenaneo la APDP ke setlamo sa tlhohleletšo ya botšweletši intastering ya dikoloi leo nepokgolo ya lona lego go hlohleletša palo ya godimo ya dikoloi tšeo di tšweletšwago mo intastering ya difatanaga yeo go boletšwego ka yona, go tlhohleletša boleng bja tlaleletšo lefapheng la intasteri ya dikoloi gore go hlongwe mešomo go potologa makala le dikgwebokamano ka moka tša difatanaga.
Go tla dirwa tšhelete ya go balelwa R2,8 bilione go Makala le dikgwebokamano tša tšweletšo ya ka mo nageng ka magatotatelano APDP.
tgt_text: Lolutjalomali lulandzela etinyatselweni tekwetfulwa kweveni i-Isuzu D-Max leyakhiwe kulelive eGqeberha eMphumalanga Kapa kulenyanga lephelile.

src_text: Dipeeletšo tše di tla hloma mešomo ya thwi ya go feta ye 1 000 polanteng le go thwala ka tsela ya go rarela batho ba go lekana 24 000 gomme se se tla thuša kudu go kaonafatša setšhaba mo seleteng se..     Indaba ya tša Meepo.
tgt_text: Lesitukulwane lesisha sema-D-Max siluphawu lwekutinikela kwe-Isuzu lapha eNingizimu Afrika futsi ingulenye  yetimphumelelo letifezekisiwe ngaphasi kweLuhlelo Lwekutfutfukisa Kukhicitwa Kwetimoto (i-APDP).

src_text: Tiragalo ya Indaba ya Meepo ya Afrika ya 2022 yeo bego swaretšwe kua Sentharengkgoparara ya Boditšhabatšhaba gola Motsekapa go thoma ka la 9 go fihla ka la 12 Mopitlo 2022 ke ye nngwe ya difala tše kgolokgolo tša dikopano le tša kgwerano magareng ga bakgathatema ka moka intastering ya meepo.
tgt_text: Le-APDP iluhlelo lekukhutsata kukhicita lokucondziswe embonini yetimoto lokuhloswe ngalo kugcugcutela umkhicito ngebunyenti kule mboni yetimotoe, ngekugcugcutela  lizingagugu lelengetiwe emkhakheni wemboni yetetimoto ngaleyo ndlela-ke kudaleke ematfuba emsebenti kutinchubo tekukhicita timoto.

src_text: Morero wa tiragalo ye ke wo: “Mpshafatšo ya Meepo ka mo Afrika: Go Beeletša ka gare ga Diphetogo tša Enetši, ESG, le Diikonomi”.
tgt_text: Tilinganiselwa kutigidzigidzi leti-R. 8 letitawukwentiwa emkhicitweni welizingagugu walelive ngekusebentisa umjikeleto we-APDP.

src_text: Kabinete nale tshepho ya gore Indaba ye ya Meepo tla thuša go laetša le go hlohleletša Afrika Borwa go ba naga ya boikgethelo dipeeletšong.
tgt_text: Lolutjalomali lutawudala imisebenti ngco lengetulu kwe-1000 kulesosikhungomkhicito bese kutsi bantfu labange-24 000 bacashwe hhayi ngco, lokuyintfo letawufaka ligalelo lelimcoka ekutfutfukiseni lesifundza..     Ingcugcutsela Yetetimayini.

src_text: Afrika Borwa amogela dipeeletšo tšeo di dirilwego ka mo nageng ya gaborena ebile ikgafetše go hlola maemo go kgontšha phethagalo ya kgolo ye akaretšago ya ikonomi le diphetogo ikonoming.
tgt_text: Ingcungcutsela yeLutjalomali Etimayini Tase-Afrika yanga-2022 lebeyibanjelwe eCape Town International Convention Centre kusukela ngamhla ti-9 kuya mhla ti-12 Inkhwekhweti 2022, ingulenye yetinkhundla letinkhulu kakhulu tekuchumana nekuhlanganyela emkhatsini walabatsintsekako embonini yetimayini.

src_text: Dikamano tša Boditšhabtšhaba le tša Dilete.
tgt_text: Ingcikitsi yalomcimbi beyitsi: “Kugucugucuka Kwetimayini e-Afrika: Kutjala Timali eKuntjintjeni Kutemandla, i-ESG neMinotfo.”.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše Kopano ya malobanyana mo ya Mopresidente Ramaphosa ge be kopana le Mopresidente Joe Biden wa Amerika, Mopresidente Emmanuel Macron wa Fora le Mopresidente Hakainde Hichilema wa Zambia difaleng tša go fapafapana.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi inelitsemba lekutsi leNgcungcutsela Yetetimayini itawusita ekukhombiseni nasekugcugcuteleni iNingizimu Afrika njengendzawo yelutjalomali longatikhetsela yona.

src_text: Dikopano tše di kgontšhitše Mopresidente go matlafatša dikamano tša magareng ga dinaga magareng ga Afrika Borwa le mebušo ya dinaga tšeo gweranego le tšona mererong ye bohlokwa ya dilete le ya boditšhabatšhaba, go karetšwa le go tla ka tharollo ya go rena moya wa khutšo dithulanong tša Ukraine     Diphetho tša Kabinete.
tgt_text: Live laseNingizimu Afrika liyalwemukela lutjalomali lapha kulelive letfu futsi itimisele kudala timo letikuvunako loko kute kutsi kube nekukhula lokufaka wonkhe wonkhe kanye nekugcuculwa kwemnotfo.

src_text: Diboutu tša Tekanyetšokabo.
tgt_text: Budlelwane bemave emhlaba nebesigodzi.

src_text: Kabinete dira boipiletšo go badudi ka moka go šala morago Diboutu tša go fapafapana tša Tekanyetšokabo tša go tla ka dikgoro tša mmušo tša bosetšhaba le ka Kantoro ya Mopresidente gore ba tle ba kgone go netefatša gore mmušo wa ikarabela diphethong tša ona..     Ka nako ya Diboutu tša Tekanyetšokabo, dikgoro ka moka di fana ka tlhalošo ye tseneletšego ya dithulaganyo tša ona le ka mananeo ao beilwego pele ngwaga.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iphindze futsi yemukela kucocisana lokusandza kwenteka kwaMengameli Ramaphosa naMengameli Joe Biden waseMelika, Mengameli Emmanuel Macron waseFrance naMengameli Hakainde Hichilema waseZambiya ngetinkhundla tekuchumana letahlukene.

src_text: Diboutu tša Tekanyetšokabo di nepile go netefatša gore dikhwama tša mmušo di šomišwa ka pabalelo gore di tle di kgone go fihlelela dinyakwa tša batho setšhabeng..     Diboutu tše tša Tekanyetšokabo di fana gape le ka monyetla wo mobotse go Ditona gore ba kgone go hlatholla goya pele mošomo wa mmušo, go akaretšwa le dikatlego le ditlhotlo..     Phethagatšo ya Leanopeakanyo la Gase ya Petroleamo yeo Fetošeditšwego Diela (LPG).
tgt_text: Lokucocisana kwente kutsi Mengameli acinise budlelwane bemacembu lamabili kanye nekusebentisana emkhatsini weNingizimu Afrika nemibuso lebalingani mayelana netindzaba letimcoka tesifundza netemave emhlaba, lokufaka ekhatsi kutfola likhambi lekuthula kuloludvweshu lwase-Ukraine     Tincumo teKhabhinethi.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go hlongwa ga Phethagatšo ya Leanopeakanyo la LPG, leo le phatlaladitšwego ka Hlakola.
tgt_text: Emavoti eSabelomali.

src_text: Leanopeakanyo le le nepile go oketša intasteri ya LPG ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi icela tonkhe takhamuti kutsi tilandzelele laMavoti lahlukahlukene eSabelomali lentiwa ngematiko ahulumende wavelonkhe kanye neLihhovisi laMengameli kutsi tente hulumende kutsi atilandze.

src_text: LPG tla ba le mohola wo mogolo go fetošafetoša methopo ya enetši..     Leanopeakanyo le, magareng ga magatotharollo mangwe, le tla laola go bewa ga ditheko magatong dikgwebokamano le go thekga bohlami bja disilintere tša LPG ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: Ngesikhatsi seMavoti eSabelomali, onkhe ematiko anika inchazelo lenemininingwane yemasu awo kanye naloko lakubeke embili latawucala ngako akwente ngemnyaka.

src_text: Le tla thuša gape go ruta batho setšhabeng ka mehola ya go šomiša LPG bjalo ka mokgwa wo mongwe wa enetši..     Leanopeakanyo le le tla thoma go hwetšagala morago ga ge le phatlaladitšwe ke Kgoro ya Methopo ya Diminirale le Enetši mo go www.dmr.gov.za.
tgt_text: EMavoti eSabelomali ahlose kucinisekisa kutsi timali tahulumende tisetjentiswa ngelikhono yini kuhlangabetana netidzingo temmango.

src_text: Tlhako ye Logetšwego Maano ya Bosetšhaba ka Temošo ya Ditokelo tša bao ba Phelago ka Bogole – Kwalakwatšo ya Masolo Batho ba go Phela ka Bogole.
Kabinete dumeletše Tlhako ye Logetšwego Maano ya Bosetšhaba godimo ga Temošo ya Ditokelo tša Digole – Go Hloma Masolo Batho ba go Phela ka Bogole.
tgt_text: LaMavoti aphindze futsi ente kutsi kube nenkhundla lefanele kutsi Tindvuna tichaze kabanti umsebenti wahulumende, lokufaka ekhatsi timphumelelo netinsayeya.

src_text: Tlhako ye nepile go fa tlhahlo go bobedi mafapha praebete le setšhaba go netefatša gore ditokelo tša batho ba go phela ka bogole di šireletšwa, goya le ka fao di hlalošitšwego ka gare ga Molaotheo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa wa.
tgt_text: Kukhishwa kweLisubuciko lekwenta Igesi Leluketjeti (i-LPG).
Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile Kukhishwa kweLisubuciko le-LPG kutsi lifezekiswe, lelashicilelwa ngeNdlovulenkhulu 2022 kutsi kubonisanwe ngalo nemmango.

src_text: Tlhako ye fana ka setlabakelo seo se tla thušago go fediša mapheko semorafe ge go tšewa diphetho, kudukudu diphetho tša go amana le batho ba go phela ka bogole thuša gape le ka go lemoša batho ba go phela ka bogole go tseba ditokelo tša bona goya le ka fao di šireleditšwego ke Molaotheo.
tgt_text: Lelisubuciko kuhloselwe ngalo kutsi kwengetwe imboni ye-LPG kulelive.

src_text: Tlhako ye fana le ka tlhahlo, dipego tša babegaditaba le go lemoša batho setšhabeng ka ditokelo tša batho ba go phela ka bogole kgontšha Sengwalwa sa Makgoraditsela ka Ditokelo tša Batho ba go Phela ka bogole.
tgt_text: I-LPG itawufaka ligalelo lelibonakalako ekwehlukaniseni imitfombolusito yetemandla..     Lelisubuciko emkhatsini waletinye tingenelelo, litawulawula intsengo yetinchubo temkhicito kanye nekwesekela kwakhiwa emabhodlela e-LPG kulelive.

src_text: Afrika Borwa ke ye nngwe ya dinaga tša go tsenela Kwanokgoparara ya Ditšhabakopano (UN) ka ditokelo tša Batho ba go Phela ka Bogole le Tshepedišo ya UN Kwanong ya Afrika ka Ditokelo tša Botho le Ditokelo tša Batho ba go Phela ka Bogole (Tshepedišo ya Afrika ya Ditokelo tša Digole).
tgt_text: Litawuphindza futsi lifundzise ummango mayelana netinzuzo tekusebentisa i-LPG njengalenye indlela yetemandla.

src_text: Tlhako ye rerišanwe le bakgathatema ka moka, go akaretšwa le Khansele ya Bosetšhaba ya Bašomi le Tlhabollo ya Bosetšhaba.
tgt_text: Lelisubiciko litawutfolakala ngemuva kwekutsi selishicilelwe Litiko Letetimbiwa Nemandla ku: www.dmr.gov.za.

src_text: Samiti ya Tsamaišo ya Naga le Pušetšo ya Naga Mafelong Dinagaborekwa.
tgt_text: Luhlakamsebenti Lwavelonkhe Lwelisubuciko lolumayelana neMkhankhaso Wekuvusa Kucashelwa kweMalungelo Ekukhubateka eBantfu Labaphila Nekukhubateka.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go swarwa ga Samiti ya Tsamaišo ya Naga le Pušetšo ya Naga  Mafelong Dinagaborekwa ka Labohlano, 27 le ka Mokibelo, 28 Mopitlo 2022 gola Gauteng.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iluvumile Luhlakamsebenti Lwavelonkhe Lwelisubuciko lolumayelana neMkhankhaso Wekuvusa Kucashelwa kweMalungelo eKukhubateka eBantfu Labaphila Nekukhubateka.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše Pego ya Maikemišetšo ka Tsamaišo ya Naga le Pušetšo ya Naga Mafelong Dinagaborekwa ka Hlakola.
tgt_text: Loluhlakamsebenti kuhloselwe ngalo kukhomba indlela imikhakha yomibili yahulumende naletimele ekucinisekiseni emalungelo ebantfu labaphila nekukhubateka kutsi ayavikeleka, njengaloku abhalwe kuMtsetfosisekelo waseRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika wanga-.

src_text: Kabinete file tlhahlo ya gore ditherišano tša goya pele di swarwe gotee le bakgathatema ba maleba.
Samiti ye tla ba tatelano le pheletšo ya mošomo wo dirilwego ngwageng wa go feta, fao dikgopolo tša bakgathatema ba go fapafapana di tla akaretšwago     Ditiragalo tšeo di Tlago.
tgt_text: Loluhlakamsebenti lingumgodla lotawusita ekususeni tihibe letibandlululako ekutsatseni tincumo, ikakhulu leto letiphatselene nebantfu labaphila nekukhubateka.

src_text: Khonferense ya Bohlano ya Lefase ka Bophara ya Phedišo ya Tšhomišo ya Bana Bokgoba.
tgt_text: Luphindze futsi lukhumbute bantfu labaphila nekukhubateka kutsi bati kutsi emalungelo abo avikelwe nguMtsetfosisekelo.

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla swara Khonferense ya Bohlano ya Lefase ka Bophara ya Phedišo ya Tšhomišo ya Bana Bokgoba kua Sentharengkgoparara ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Durban gola KwaZulu-Natal go thoma ka Lamorena, 15 go fihla ka Labohlano, 20 Mopitlo.
tgt_text: Loluhlelomsebenti luphindze futsi lwente kutsi kube nekuceceshwa, betindzaba lababikako kanye nekuvusa kucaphelisa ummango mayelana nemalungelo ebantfu labaphila nekukhubateka..     Lunika emandla kutsi Umtsetfo Lokusakhulunyisanwa Ngawo lomayelana neBantfu Labaphila Nekukhubateka.

src_text: Ke lekga la mathomothomo Mokgatlo wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa Bašomi (ILO) swara khonferense ye ka mo Afrika..     Baetapele ba mebušo, ditona tše 120, baemedi ba seboka sa boraro ba dinaga tše 187 tše lego maloko ILO, dietšensi tša UN, ditheo tša thuto, mekgatlo yeo thomilwego setšhabeng, babegaditaba le mekgatlo setšhabeng go letetšwe gore be gona khonferenseng ye.
tgt_text: Live laseNingizimu Afrika lisisayinile Sivumelwano saMhlabuhlangene (i-UN) lesimayelana neMalungelo eBantfu Labaphila Nekukhubateka kanye neNchubo yaMhlabuhlangene kuMculu wase-Afrika lomayelana neLuntfu neMalungelo eBantfu mayelana neMalungelo eBantfu Labaphila Ngekukhubateka (Inchubo yase-Afrika yeBantfu Labaphila Nekukhubateka).

src_text: Tiragalo ye tla fa Afrika Borwa monyetla wa go hlagiša Molaotheo wa naga ye ka ge šireletša ditokelo tša bana.
tgt_text: Loluhlakamsebenti kwabonisanwa ngalo nabo bonkhe labafanele labatsintsekako, lokufaka ekhatsi Tekutfutfukiswa Kwetemnotfo Nemkhandlu Webasebenti.

src_text: Naga ye tla kopana le dinaga tša go fapafapana tšeo di lego pejana ga rena go fedišwa tšhomišo ya bana bjalo ka makgoba le go ithuta go tšwa go bona..     Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya Mmotlolo wa Tlhabollo ya Dilete (DDM).
tgt_text: Ingcungcutsela yeKuphatfwa Kwemhlaba Nemalungelo eBunikati Nekusetjentiswa Kwemhlaba eTindzaweni teMmango.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla swara Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya DDM gola  Mpumalanga ka Labohlano, 20 Mopitlo 2022 ka fase ga morero wo: “Ga go tlogelwe motho morago”.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kusingatfwa kweNgcungcutsela yeKuphatfwa Kwemhlaba neMalungelo eBunikati Nekusetjentiswa Kwemhlaba eTindzaweni teMmango ngaLesihlanu, mhla tinge-27 nangeMgcibelo, mhla tinge-28 Inkhwekhweti 2022 eGauteng.

src_text: Bjalo ka sefala se bohlokwa sa kgathotema setšhabeng, Imbizo ye dumelela Mopresidente go kgokagana thwi le bakgathatema ba go fapafapana – kudukudu baduding ba dinagamagae – le go theeletša dillo le ditlhotlo tša bona ka nepo ya go di rarolla.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi isivumile Sitatimende Sesinyatselo Leme Kuso lesimayelana neKuphatfwa Kwemhlaba neMalungelo eBunikat Nekusetjentiswa Kwemhlabai eTindzaweni teMmango  ngeNdlovulenkhulu nga-.

src_text: Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya DDM nepile gape le go tloša tseleng mapheko go šitiša kabo ya mohlakanelwa ya ditirelo le go hlohleletša kgathotema setšhabeng ka go tsamaišana le DDM.
tgt_text: Ifake sicondziso lesitsi kube nekubonisana lokuchubekako nalabanye labafanele labatsintsekako.

src_text: MaAfrika Borwa ba ka šala morago le go kgatha tema ditherišanong tša dikgokagano tša leago ka fase ga hashtag #PresidentialImbizo.
tgt_text: Lengcungcutsela itawuba ngumphumela wemsebenti lowentiwe kulomnyaka lophelile, leyacela imibono kulabatsintsekako labahlukahlukene     Imicimbi Letako.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Afrika.
tgt_text: Inkhomfa Yemhlaba Wonkhe Yesihlanu lemayelana neKucedza Kusebentisa Bantfwana.

src_text: Meketeko ya ngwaga ka ngwaga ya Kgwedi ya Afrika ka Laboraro, 25 Mopitlo gare ya ketekwa ka fase ga morero wo: “Ngwaga wa Phepho: Go tiišeletšwa phepho le tšhireletšego ya dijo kontinenteng ya Afrika”..     Bjalo ka karolo ya ponelopele ya lebaka le le telele yeo theilwego ka gare ga Lenaneothero la 2063 (leo lego seakanywa sa Afrika sa tlhabollo go fihlelela tlhabollo ye akaretšago le ya go tšea nako ye telele go hlabolla seemo sa ikonomi maphelong mo mengwageng ye 50 ye tlago), morero šeditše mabokgoni batho ba Afrika go lebeletšwe kudu basadi, batšwamahlalagading le bana.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika itawube isingatse Inkhomfa Yemhlaba Wonkhe Yesihlanu lemayelana neKucedza Kusetjentiswa Kwebantfwana letawube ise-Durban International Convention Centre KwaZulu-Natal kusukela ngeLisontfo, ti-15 kuya ngaLesihlanu, mhla tinge-20 Inkhwekhweti.

src_text: Se se bohlokwa tlhabollong ka ge se tliša maphelo ao kaonafetšego go motho mang le mang, letseno leo le hlatlogetšego godimo le meputso yeo kaonafetšego ya dinaga.
tgt_text: Kwekucala kutsi Inhlangano Yemave Emhlaba Yebasebenti (i-ILO) kutsi isingatse lenkhomfa lapha e-Afrika..     Tinhloko temibuso, tindvuna leti-120, imikhandlu lemitsatfu yemave la-187 e-ILO, ema-ejensi e-UN, tikhungo temfundvo, tinhlangano temmango, tinhlangano letingekho ngaphasi kwahulumende, betindzaba nemmango ulindzeleke kutsi uyihambele lenkhomfa.

src_text: Tiragalo ya go itshwanetša le noši ya meketeko ya Kgwedi ya Afrika ke Beke ya Afrika ya Dikgokagano, yeo tlo swarelwago kua Constitutional Hill gola Johannesburg go thoma ka la 23 go fihla ka la 27 Mopitlo.
tgt_text: Lomcimbi utawuphindze wente kutsi iNingizimu Afrika igcamise Umtsetfosisekelo walelive njengaloku uvikela emalungelo ebantfwana.
Lelive litawuchumana nemave lahlukene lasembili kunatsi ekucedzeni kusetjentiswa kwebantfwana futsi sitawufundza kuwo.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Afrika ke monyetla wa go hlohleletša botee bja Afrika le momaganyo ye tseneletšego ya dilete tša yona, le go ikgafa ka leswa katlegong ye swanago ya Afrika.
tgt_text: Imbizo yaMengameli YeLuhlelo Lwekutfutfukiswa Kwetigodzi (i-DDM).

src_text: Kabinete gopotša motho mang le mang gore kgahlego ya rena ya bosetšhaba ke monwana le lenala le tielelo ya Afrika, botee le katlego     Melaetša.
tgt_text: Mengameli Ramaphosa utawube asingatse Imbizo yaMengameli Yekutfutfukiswa Kwetigodzi ngaLesihlanu, mhla tinge-20 Inkhwekhweti 2022 ngaphasi kwengcikitsi letsi: “Ungashiyi namunye ngemuva”.

src_text: Mahloko     Kabinetee lebiša mahloko yona go malapa le bagwera ba: Mme Phindile Xaba (53), yo bilego le mošomo wo motelele wa go hlomphega intastering ya babegaditaba, ka mo Afrika Borwa le ka mošate šomile bošego le mosegare go kaonafatša naga ya gaborena.
tgt_text: Njengendlela yenkhundla lemcoka yekutimbandzakanya kwemmango, leMbizo ivumela Mengameli kutsi achumane ngco nalabatsintsekako labahlukahlukene – ikakhulu imimango yasetindzaweni tasemaphandleni – kanye nekulalela tingcinamba tawo kanye netinsayeya ngenhloso yekutilungisa.

src_text: Motseta Silumko Sokupa (74), yo hlanketšego Etšensi ya Tšhireletšego ya Mmušo maemong go fapafapana mo mošomong wa gagwe wa go tšea nako ye telele le wa go hlomphega Ditirelong tša Mmušo.Moprofesara Francis Wilson (83), raikonomi wa go tsebega kudu le mothomi wa Yuniti ya Bašomi ya Borwa bja Afrika le ya Tlhabollo ya Dinyakišišo     Bao ba Thwetšwego Mešomong Batho ka moka bao ba thwetšwego mešomong mangwalo bona dithuto tlo netefatšwa le go tiišeletšwa ka tsela ye maleba.
tgt_text: LeMbizo yaMengameli Yekutfutfukiswa Kwesigodzi  ihlose kuvula lapho kuvaleke khona ekwetfuleni tinsita letihlanganisiwe kanye nekugcugcutela kutimbandzakanya kwemmango lokuhambisana ne-DDM.

src_text: Ngaka Kesavan Naidoo bjalo ka Motlatša Molaodipharephare (DDG): Tlhabollo ya Setheo kua Kgorong ya Tirišano ya Makala Mmušo (DCoG).
tgt_text: Bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika bangalandzela lokwentekako futsi batimbandzakanye kuloko lokucocwako etinkhundleni tekuchumana ngaphasi kwe-hashtag letsi: #PresidentialImbizo.

src_text: Ntate Siphosihle Emmanuel Hlomuka bjalo ka DDG: Thekgo ya Pušoselegae le Taolo ya Magato kua DCoG..     Ntate Risimati Patrick Mathye bjalo ka DDG: Taolo ya Ditirelo tša Meetse le Tlhwekišo kua Kgorong ya Meetse le Tlhwekišo (DWS)..     Ntate Collin Xolani Zwane bjalo ka DDG: Taolo, Kobamelo le Phethagatšo kua DWS.
tgt_text: Inyanga yase-Afrika.

src_text: Ntate Melanchton Makobe bjalo ka DDG: Kgonthišišo ya Pušo ya SOC le Bodiragatši kua Kgorong ya Dikgwebo tša Mmušo     Kabinete dumelelane le Ditona ka dithwalo tšeo di latelago:.
tgt_text: Kugujwa njalo ngemnyaka kweNyanga yase-Afrika neLusuku Lwase-Afrika ngaLesitsatfu, mhla tinge-25 Inkhwekhweti lubungatwa ngaphasi kwengcikitsi letsi: “Umnyaka Wekudla Lokunemsoco: Kucinisa likhono lekucina ekudleni lokunemsoco kanye nekubakhona kwekudla kulelivekati lase-Afrika”.

src_text: Ntate Bhekuyise Mathews Khenisa bjalo ka Mohlankediphethišimogolwane (CEO) wa Etšensi ya Tlhabollo ya Dintlo (HDA).
tgt_text: Njengencenye yembononchanti wesikhatsi lesidze lobhalwe ku-Ajenda 2063 (lokulisu lase-Afrika lekufezekisa intfutfuko yetemnotfo lefaka wonkhe wonkhe nalesimeme kwengca iminyaka lenge-50), lengcikitsi igcile emandleni lakhona ebantfu base-Afrika ekugcizeleleni kakhulu kubomake, kubantfu labasha nakubantfwana.

src_text: Mme Joy Keledi Masemola bjalo ka Mohlankedimogolwane wa Ditšhelete (COO) wa HAD.
tgt_text: Loku kumcoka kutentfutfuko ngobe kuholela etimphilweni letentiwe ncono yalowo nalowo, inzuzo lenkhulu, kanye nemalingena lencono yemave..     Lokugcame kakhulu lokubonakalako kulemigubho yeNyanga yase-Afrika, Liviki lase-Afrika Letekuchumana, lelitawubanjelwa lapha e-Constitution Hill eJozi kusukela mhla tinge-23 kuya mhla tinge-27 Inkhwekhweti..     Inyanga yase-Afrika ilitfuba lekugcugcutela bunye base-Afrika kanye nekuhlanganiswa ngalokujulile kwesifundza, kanye nekutinikela futsi kwe-Afrika kuloko lephokopholele kufika kuko lokusifaka sonkhe.

src_text: Ngaka Cornelius Ruiters bjalo ka CEO ya Lepelle Northern Water.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikhumbuta lowo nalowo kutsi timfuno tetfu tavelonkhe tihlangene nekusimama kwe-Afrika, bunye kanye nemphumelelo yayo     Imilayeto.

src_text: Matsapa go Boetša Seemo Sekeng le go Aga ka Leswa Morago ga Mafula.
tgt_text: Imitamo yekuvuselela nekwakha kabusha ngemuva kwetikhukhula.

src_text: Kabinete retile le go thabela batho ka moka le mekgatlo ge tsentšhitše letsogo mo matsapeng go boetša seemo sekeng le go aga ka leswa morago ga mafula moragorago go setla pelo dikarolong tše dingwe tša naga, kudukudu gola KwaZulu-Natal.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ivakalise kubonga lokukhulu kubo bonkhe bantfu netinhlangano letidlale indzima emitameni yekuvuselela kanye nekwakha kabusha ngemuva kwetikhukhula letisandza kwenteka kuletinye tincenye talelive, ikakhulukati KwaZulu-Natal.

src_text: Kabinete lebogile gape le mekgatlo ye sego ya mmušo, mekgatlo ya sedumedi, setšhaba ka kakaretšo, bengdikgwebo le mekgatlo ya go imolla batho maima bona yeo abetšego batho dijo, diaparo, mapai, diphuthelwana tša mengatana ya lehlapo, diyunifomo tša dikolo go malapa ao wetšwego ke masetlapelo gore ba kgone go fihlelela dinyakwa tša bona tša motheo.
tgt_text: Ibonge tonkhe tinhlangano letingekho ngaphasi kwahulumende, tinhlangano tetenkholo, imimango, bosomabhizinisi netinhlangano letisita imimango ngekudla, tingubo tekugcoka, tingubo tekulala, tinsita tekubuyisa sitfunti nekuhlonipheka kanye netinyifomu tesikolwa emindenini lekhahlabetekile kute kutsi ikhone kuhlangabetana netidzingo tayo letibalulekile..     Sikhungo Savelonkhe Setekulawula Kwetinhlekelele siyachubeka nekuchumanisa tonkhe tigaba tahulumende emitameni yaso yekusita ngelusito lwekuhhamula bantfu kuwo onkhe emakhaya latsintsekile.

src_text: Senthara ya Bosetšhaba ya Taolo ya Masetlapelo tla kopantšha didiko ka moka tša mmušo mo matsapeng yona go fana ka kimollo ya moya wa botho malapeng ka moka ao amilwego ke mafula.
tgt_text: Tinsita tekukhosela tinikwa bantfu labangetulu kwe-7 000 etigodzini letine letikhahlabeteke kakhulu KwaZulu-Natal..     Sewucalile umsebenti wekwakhiwa kwetindlu tesikhashana temindeni lekhahlabetekile etindzaweni letingaphasi kwahulumende letikhonjiwe  KwaZulu-Natal kute kutsi tihlaliswe.

src_text: Ditirelo tša go abela batho madulo di gare di abelwa batho ba go feta 7 000 mo dileteng tšeo di amilwego go se lekane le selo gola KwaZulu-Natal..     Mošomo šetše thomile go aga madulo lebakanyana malapa go angwa ke mafula mo nageng ye lego ya mmušo ye hlaotšwego gola KwaZulu-Natal ka kgonagalo ya gore malapa a ka šuthišetšwa fao.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikucinisekisile kutibophelela kwahulumende ekuphatseni timali telusito lwetikhukhula ngebuhlakani nangekungafihli lutfo.

src_text: Kabinete tiišeleditše maikgafo mmušo go laola dikhwama tša kimollo ya masetlapelo ka šedi ye kgolo le ka go se fihle selo.
tgt_text: Umcwaningimabhuku Jikelele waseNingizimu Afrika usita ngemsebenti wekulandzelela lowengetiwe kanye nekuhlela kabusha kusetjentiswa kwetimali lokufanele kutsi kubekwe embili ngekuhambisana neluhlelo lwahulumende lwesabelomali..     Takamuva mayelana neLigciwane leSifo seKhorona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Mohlakišipharephare wa Afrika Borwa fana ka ditirelo tša tlaleletšo tša go bea seemo leihlo le go lebiša dikhwama dinyakweng tše dingwe ka go tsamaišana le peakanyo ya tekanyetšo ya mmušo.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi incuse bonkhe bantfu labaseNingizimu Afrika kutsi batsatse tinyatselo tekuphepha kute kutsi bagweme kubhebhetseka kwe-COVID-19 ngemuva kwekutsi tibalo takamuva tibonise kwandza lokuphawulekako kwelizinga lalesifo kanye netifo letihlobene nesikhatsi sasebusika eveni..     Ikhabhinethi ikhumbute wonkhe umuntfu kutsi achubeke nekuzivikela tsine kanye nalabanye bantfu ngekugeza tandla tetfu njalo noma kusebentisa sibulali-magciwane, kufaka tifonyo uma singekhatsi kwetakhiwo, sikhweshelane nebantfu, kuvula amafasitelo kute kutsi kungene umoya lohlobile kanye nekugoma.

src_text: Tsebišo ya Seemo sa Bolwetši bja Coronavirus (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Kugoma nguyona ndlela lencono kakhulu yekutivikela ku-COVID-19 ngoba kuvimbela kugula lokumatima, kulaliswa esibhedlela ngisho nekufa.

src_text: Kabinete hlohleleditše batho ka moka mo Afrika Afrika go tšea magato tlhokomelo go efoga go phatlalala ga COVID-19 morago ga gore dipalopalo tša moragorago di laetše tlhatlogo ye bonagalago ya kelo ya diphetelo le malwetši go amana le sehla sa marega ka mo nageng..     Kabinete re gopoditše ka moka ga rena go tšwelapele go ihlokomela le go hlokomela ba bangwe ka go hlapa matsogo rena goba go sanithaesa kgafetšakgafetša, go apara dimaseke ge re le ka gare ga meago, go šielana sekgala sa go bolokega, go bula mafastere gore go hlabele moya le go hlaba meento.
tgt_text: Awudzingi likheli lasekhaya kute kutsi ugome.

src_text: Meento santše le boiphemelo bjo bo kaonekaone kgahlanong le COVID-19 ka ge thibela malwetši šoro, go amogelwa maokelong le go efoga mahu go hlolwa ke COVID-.
tgt_text: Nanoma ngubani, angaba namatisi noma abete, ugoma mahhala kuto tonkhe tindzawo tekugoma kulo lonkhe lelive.

src_text: Ga go hlokege aterese ya mo dulago pele ka entelwa.
tgt_text: Vimba lubandlululo lwebuhlanga!.

src_text: Motho mang le mang, wa go ba le pasa goba sena yona ka hlaba moento ntle le tefo mafelong bohle go hlaba meento go potologa naga ka bophara.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi itigcekile kakhulu tonkhe tento tekubandlululana ngekwelibala eveni, lokufaka ekhatsi netehlakalo letibikiwe eSikolweni Semabanga Laphakeme sase-Good Hope Seminary kanye naseNyuvesi yaseStellenbosch eNshonalanga Kapa.

src_text: Semorafe se fele!.
tgt_text: Letento letidzabukisako tingcubutana nemagugu eMtsetfosisekelo lekwakhelwe kulo live letfu lentsandvo yelinyenti, lokufaka ekhatsi sitfunti semuntfu, kungabandlululani ngebuhlanga, bulungiswa betenhlalakahle, kulingana kanye nenhlonipho..     Umtsetfosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika wanga-1996 uyinkhombandlela yetfu yekucedza luchekeko lolunyanyekako kanye nekungabi nebulungiswa kwesikhatsi lesendlulile.

src_text: Kabinete sotše ka bogale ditiragalo ka moka tša semorafe ka mo nageng, go akaretšwa le ditiragalo tšeo di begilwego Sekolong seo se Phagamego sa Good Hope Seminary le Yunibesithing ya Stellenbosch gola Kapa Bodikela.
tgt_text: Batali bayancuswa kutsi bafundzise bantfwana kwala kubandlululwa ngekwebuhlanga futsi bamukele kwehlukahlukana, njengencenye yemkhankhaso wetfu wekukhutsata kwakhiwa kwesive nekubumbana kwemmango.

src_text: Ditiragalo tše tša mahlabišadihlong di thulana le metheo ya Molaotheo yeo naga ya rena ya temokrasi ithekgilego ka yona, yeo akaretšago seriti sa botho, go se kgetholle ka semorafe, go se kgetholle ka bong, tekatekano le tlhomphano..     Molaotheo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa wa 1996 ke ona re hlahlago gore re fediše ditiragalo tšeo di tšwago kua morago tša go se hlamatsege tšeo di dirago gore re se be ngatana ye tee le tšeo di abelanago ka toka ka go se swane.
tgt_text: Asisebente ngekubambisana kute sibeke ebaleni lubandlululo nanoma ngukuphi lapho lutsatfwa njengentfo lefanele siphindze futsi sitfumele umlayeto locacile wekutsi kute indzawo yalo lapha eveni letfu; lentsandvo yelinyenti..     Budlelwane beNingizimu Afrika – neJalimane.

src_text: Batswadi ba hlohleletšwa go ruta bana go ganetša semorafe le go thabela ditšo tša go fapafapana, bjalo ka karolo ya lesolo la rena la mohlakanelwa la go hlohleletša kago ya setšhaba le phedišano setšhabeng re šomeng mmogo go bea nyanyeng semorafe nako le nako ge se se thoma go ba setlwaedi sa ka mehla le go romela molaetša wo bogale wa gore semorafe ga sena bodulo ka mo nageng ya gaborena ya temokrasi..     Dikamano tša Afrika Borwa le Germany.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ilwemukele Luvakasho Lolusemtsetfweni lwaShansela We-Federal Republic of Germany, Umhlonishwa Olaf Scholz, eNingizimu Afrika ngaLesibili, mhla tinge-24 Inhlaba.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše ketelo ye atlegilego ya semmušo ka Mokhanseliri wa Rephabliki ya Germany, Mohlomphegimogolo Olaf Scholz, go tla ka mo Afrika Borwa ka Labobedi, 24 Mopitlo.

tgt_text: Kuvakasha Lokusemtsetfweni kwaShansela Scholz bekungesimemo saMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, lohola umkhankhaso wahulumende wekugcugcutela budlelwano lobuhle besifundza kanye nemave emhlaba, kanye nekuheha batjalitimali labadzingeka kakhulu.

src_text: Ketelo ye ya Semmušo ka Mokhanseliri Scholz ebile gona ka baka la taletšo ya go tšwa go Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa yo eteletšego pele seboka sa go kgontšha dikamano tše botse tša dilete le tša boditšhabatšhaba, gotee le go goka dipeeletšo tšeo di hlokagalago kudu.
tgt_text: Labaholi lababili bakhulume, emkhatsini walokunye, ngetindlela tekutfutfukisa kubambisana etindzaweni letifana namandla agezi nekuntjintja kwesimo selitulu, kuhwebelana nekutjalwa kwetimali, kanye nekubhekana ne-COVID-19 kanye nesidzingo sekugoma.

src_text: Baetapele ba bababedi ba boletše ka, magareng ga tše dingwe, mekgwa ya go thoma tirišano magorong go swana le enetši le phetogo ya klaemete, kgwebišano le dipeeletšo, le magato kgahlanong le COVID-19 le nyakego ya meento.
tgt_text: Baphindze babuka intfutfuko kulelivekati lase-Afrika nakulamanye emave, kufaka ekhatsi kungcubutana kwe-Ukraine nemtselela wako emnotfweni wemave emhlaba kanye nekutfolakala kwekudla nemandla agezi..     Ijalimane ayigcini-nje ngekuba ngumlingani weNingizimu Afrika wesibili ngebukhulu kuteluhwebo, kodvwa futsi ingumtfombo wesitsatfu ngebukhulu wetivakashi tangesheya kwetilwandle, batjalimali labakhulu kanye nebalingani betfu ngetentfutfuko..     Inkhomfa Yesihlanu Yemave Emhlaba Lemayelana Nekucedza Kwenta Bantfwana Kutsi Babe Basebenti.

src_text: Baetapele ba ba ile ba lebeledišiša kgatelopele ye lego gona kontinenteng ya Afrika le maemong boditšhatšhaba, go akaretšwa le dithulano nageng ya Ukraine le ditlamorago tša gona go lebeletšwe ikonomi ya boditšhatšhaba le tšhireletšego ya dijo le ya enetši..     Germany se fela mogwebišani wa bobedi wo mogologolo wa Afrika Borwa, eupša ke gape mothopo wa boraro wo mogologolo wa baeti ba moše mmeeletši wo mogolo le mogwebišani go tša tlhabollo..     Khonferense ya Bohlano ya Lefase ka Bophara ka Phedišo ya Tšhomišo ya Bana Bokgoba.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi isemukele siphetfo lesiyimphumelelo seNkhomfa Yesihlanu Yemave Emhlaba Lemayelana Nekucedza Kwenta Bantfwana Kutsi Babe Basebenti lebeyibanjelwe eThekwini kusukela mhla ti-15 kuya kumhla tinge-20 Inkhwekhweti.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše thumo ye atlegilego ya Khonferense ya Bohlano ya Lefase ka Bophara ka Phedišo ya Tšhomišo ya Bana Bokgoba yeo bego swaretšwe gola Durban go thoma ka la 15 go fihla ka la 20 Mopitlo.
tgt_text: Badlalindzima labavela kuwo onkhe emave emhlaba bayihambele lenkhomfa, lebeyibanjwe ngekubambisana neNhlangano Yemhlaba Yebasebenti..     Ngemuva kwekucocisana ngemikhuba lemihle leyentiwa ngemave lahlukene nekubona emagebe kanye netinyatselo letiphutfumako letidzingekako kute kutsi kusheshiswe kucedvwa kwenta bantfwana kutsi babe basebenti kanye nekusetjentiswa ngekuphocelelwa, bamukele ‘I-Durban Call to Action’ kute kutsi kubukwane nesihlava sekwenta bantfwana kutsi babe basebenti.

src_text: Bakgathatema go tšwa lefaseng ka bophara ba bile gona khonferenseng ye, yeo bego swerwe ka tšhomišano le Mokgatlo wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa Bašomi..     Morago ga go rerišana ka ditlwaedi tše botse tše phethagaditšwego ke dinaga tša go fapafapana le go hlaola mabošaedi le magato ka pelapela ao nyakegago go akgofiša phedišo ya bobedi tšhomišo ya bana bokgoba le ya dikgoka, bakgathatema khonfereseng ye ba kwanetše morero wo ‘Boipiletšo bja Durban bja go Tšea Magato’ go swaragana le lemena la tšhomišo ya bana bokgoba.
tgt_text: Kwenta bantfwana kutsi babe basebenti kuveta sihlava lesibi kabi semmango kuphindze futsi kubeke bantfwana engotini.

src_text: Tšhomišo ya bana bokgoba ke ye nngwe ya go laetša bohlogo bjo bo ka dirwago ke setšhaba ebile išeletša bana maemong kotsi.
tgt_text: Kukuhlukubeta kanatsi futsi kuvimbela bantfwana kutsi bangakhoni kutfola imfundvo kanye nalamanye ematfuba ekutfutfuka.

src_text: Tšhomišo ya bana bokgoba ka boyona ke tlaišo ebile thibela bana go hwetša thuto ye maleba le menyetla ye mengwe ya go ba hlabolla.
tgt_text: Wonkhe umntfwana eNingizimu Afrika unelilungelo lelingeke liphikiswe lekutsi avikeleke kumikhuba yekusetjentiswa ngekubacaphata.

src_text: Ngwana wo mongwe le wo mongwe ka mo Afrika Borwa nale tokelo yeo ka se ganetšwego ke motho ya gore šireletšege kgahlanong le ditlwaedi tša go jabetša tša go šomišwa bokgoba.

Tokelo ya go hwetša thuto ya motheo gona ka gare ga Molaotheo wa rena ebile goya le ka Molao wa Dikolo wa Afrika Borwa, 1996 (Molao 84 wa 1996), “motswadi mang le mang swanetše go gapeletša morutwana ofe goba ofe yo lego ka fase ga taolo ya gagwe go ya sekolong go tloga ka letšatši la mathomothomo la go bulwa ga dikolo ngwageng wo go fihlela ge morutwana wo fihlelela mengwaga ye šupa goba mphato wa bosenyane, goya le ka gore go tlile efe pele”..     Goya ka Molao wa Bana, 2005 (Molao 38 wa 2005), “ga gona motho yo dumeletšwego go šomiša, go bapatša, go nea goba go thwala ngwana goba go mo diriša mo mešomong bjalo ka mo mešomong ya tšhomišo ya bana bokgoba”     Diphetho tša Kabinete.
tgt_text: Lilungelo lekutfola imfundvo lesisekelo licuketfwe kuMtsetfosisekelo wetfu futsi ngekweMtsetfo Wetikolwa waseNingizimu Afrika, wanga-1996 (Umtsetfo 84 wanga-1996), “wonkhe umtali kufanele ente kutsi wonkhe umfundzi ambophelele kutsi afundze esikolweni kusukela ngelilanga lesikolwa lekucala.

src_text: Kwanelo ya Kwano ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka go Šireletšwa ga Batho ka Moka Kgahlanong le go Nyameletšwa ka Dikgoka ke Maphodisa (ICPPED).
tgt_text: Lusuku lwemnyaka lapho lowo mfundzi ufinyelela iminyaka lesikhombisa kute kube lusuku lwekugcina lwesikolwa lapho lowo mfundzi afinyelela iminyaka le-15 noma ebangeni lesishiyagalolunye, kuye ngekutsi ngukuphi lokwenteka kucala”..     Ngekwemibandzela yeMtsetfo Webantfwana, wanga-2005 (Umtsetfo 38 wanga-2005), “kute umuntfu longasebentisa, atfole, noma anike noma acashe umntfwana njengemsebenti”     Tincumo TeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo ya ICPPED Palamenteng go lebeledišišwa le go dumelelwa go šomišwa ga kwano ye ke Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Kungena Kusivumelwane Semave Emhlaba mayelana Nekuvikela Bonkhe Bantfu Ekunyamalaleni Ngekuphocelelwa (I-ICPPED) .

src_text: Kwano ye ke tumelelano yeo tlemago gohlegohle ya Ditšhabakopano (UN) yeo swaraganego le go gatakwa ga ditokelo tša botho ka go nyameletšwa ga batho ka dikgoka ke maphodisa..     Kwano ye hlaloša go nyameletšwa ga batho ka dikgoka ke maphodisa go akaretša go tšhabišwa, go golegwa, go swarwa goba mokgwa ofe goba ofe wo pheletšo ya ona ka dirago gore mosolwa latole go dumela goba gona go uta fao motšwasehlabelo lego gona..     Ge šetše dumetše gore kwano ye tsenywe melaong ya rena ya ka mo nageng, Afrika Borwa go tla letelwa gore begele UN mengwaga ye mengwe le ye mengwe ye mebedi ka fao phethagatšago seo se dumeletšwego kwanong ye.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kungeniswa kwe-ICPPED ePhalamende mayelana nekucutjungulwa kwekungena kweNingizimu Afrika kulesivumelwane.

src_text: Kwano ye fana ka magato thibelo ao dinaga tšeo di lego maloko kwano ye di swanetšego go hloma go efoga go nyameletšwa ga batho ka dikgoka ke maphodisa dinageng tša bona tša go fapafapana..     Pego ya Bone ya Naga ya Afrika Borwa ka Tšhireletšo le Tlhohleletšo ya Ditokelo tša Botho.
tgt_text: Lesivumelwane sivamise kuba sibopho saMhlabuhlangane (se-UN) lesibonelelanako lesibukene nekunyatselwa kwemalungelo eluntfu ngekusetjentiswa kunyamalala kwebantfu ngekuphocelelwa.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo ya Pego ya Bone ya Naga ye ka Tšhireletšo le Tlhohleletšo ya Ditokelo tša Botho go Khansele ya Ditokelo tša Botho ya Ditšhabakopano.
Bafetleki ba UN ba Gohlegohle le ba Kgafetšakgafetša ba tla fetleka pego ye ge ngwaga ela go fela.
tgt_text: Lesivumelwane sichaza lokunyamalala kwebantfu ngekubaphocelela kute kutsi kufakwe ekhatsi kutfumba, kubopha, kutokisa noma-ke ngutiphi letinye tinhlobo letingabangela kutsi umbhebhetseli ale noma kwemukela noma-ke futsi afihle kutsi umhlukubetwa ukuphi..     Sitawutsi  singavunyelwa kutsi sibe ngaphansi kwemitsetfo yetfu, iNingizimu Afrika kulindzeleke kutsi ibike njalo ngeminyaka lemibili ku-UN mayelana nekutsi isicalisa kanjani sivumelwane.

src_text: Go tloga mola bago naga ye kwanetšego ya Kwano ya UN ya Ditokelo tša Botho, Afrika Borwa sekasekilwe makga mararo, ebile tshekatsheko ya mafelelo dirilwe ka Lewedi..     Pego ye fana ka seemo sa ditšhišinyo tše 187 tše amogetšwego go tšwa tshepetšong ya diphetleko tša ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: Lesivumelwane siniketa tinyatselo tekuvimbela emave langemalunga lokudzingeka kutsi atibeke kute kutsi avimbele kunyamalala kwebantfu ngekuphocelelwa emaveni abo..     Umbiko Wesine Welive LaseNingizimu Afrika Wekuvikela Nekukhutsatwa Kwemalungelo Ebantfu.

src_text: Dikgopolo di hweditšwe go tšwa go tshedimošo yeo kgonthišišitšwego, tshedimošo go tšwa go dikgoro tše maleba, Ditheo tša go Thekga Molaotheo le mekgatlo ye maleba ya go tšwa setšhabeng..     Kabinete thabišitšwe ke kgatelopele ye fihleletšwego phethagatšong ya ditšhišinyo tše le fao mošomo sa tšwelago pele gona.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kungeniswa kwembiko Wesine Welive LaseNingizimu Afrika Wekuvikela Nekukhutsatwa Kwemalungelo Ebantfu kuMkhandlu Wamhlabunhlangene Wemalungelo Eluntfu.

src_text: Pego ye tla dirwa phatlalatša morago ga ge hlagišeditšwe UN ka Phato.
tgt_text: Lubuyeketo Lwe-UN Lwanjalo Ngetikhatsi Letitsite lutawubuyeketa lombiko ekuhambeni kwalomnyaka.

src_text: Pholisi ya  2022 ya Taolo ya Meetse Meepo.
tgt_text: Kusukela yasayina Sivumelwano Semalungelo Ebantfu se-UN, iNingizimu Afrika seyibuyeketwe emahlandla lamatsatfu, lapho khona kubuyeketwa kwekugcina kwentiwa ngeNyoni yanga-..     Lombiko uniketa takamuva mayelana netincomo letemukelwe leti-187 kusukela nga-2017 kunchubo yekubuyeketa.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše Pholisi ya 2022 ya Taolo ya Meetse Meepo gore phethagatšwe.
tgt_text: Imibono itsetfwe kumininingwane lecinisekisiwe, kulwatiso loluvela ematikweni lafanele, tikhungo teSahluko 9 kanye netinhlangano temmango letifanele..     Ikhabhinethi iyatfokota ngenchubekelembili leyentiwe ekuphumeleliseni letincomo kanye futsi naleto tindzawo letisasetjentwa.

src_text: Pholisi ye fana ka mekgwa le magato go šireletša le go babalela tšhomišo ya meetse.
tgt_text: Lombiko utawentiwa utfolwe sive ngemuva kwekwetfulwa ku-UN ngeNgci.

src_text: Yona lekalekanya ditiragalo tša ikonomi tša meepo ka taelo ya go kgontšha tšhomišo ye swarelelago ya meetse ka mo nageng ya gaborena.
tgt_text: Inchubomgomo Yekuphatsa Emanti Asemayini yanga-.

src_text: Godimo ga magato mangwe, pholisi ye hlatholla mehola le maikarabelo ka gare ga didiko tše tharo tša mmušo mabapi le merero ya go amana le meetse ka meepong.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyivumile Inchubomgomo Yekuphatfwa Kwemanti Asemayini yanga- 2022 kutsi iphunyeleliswe.

src_text: Diphetogo tšeo di šišintšwego di tla rarolla ditlhotlo tša go thoma go hloma melao ya go iletša bao ba hlolago tšhilafalo le go dira gore go be moroba go gapeletša molawana wa gore mang le mang yo hlolago tšhilafalo rwešwe maikarabelo go phošolla goba go bušetša morago.
tgt_text: Lenchubomgomo iniketa timiso tekuvikela nekonga kusetjentiswa kwemanti.

src_text: Pholisi ye hlamilwe ka go tsamaišana le Molao wa Bosetšhaba wa Meetse, 1998 (Molao 36 wa 1998).
tgt_text: Isimamisa imisebenti yetemnotfo yasemayini ngeligunyakwenta lekuniketa lelive kusetjentiswa kwemanti ngalokusimeme.

src_text: Pego ka Tlhako ya Thulaganyo ye Hlamilwego goya ka Bong, Bolekanyetši, Phetleko ya Mošomo le Botlhakiši.
tgt_text: Emkhatsini waletinye tingenelelo, lenchubomgomo icacisa tibopho netindzima letidlalwa emkhatsini waletinhlaka letintsatfu tahulumende mayelana netindzaba temanti.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše pego ya mošomo wo dirilwego godimo ga phethagatšo ya Tlhako ya Thulaganyo ye Hlamilwego goya ka Bong, Bolekanyetši, Phetleko ya Mošomo le Botlhakiši.
tgt_text: Letingucuko letihlongotwako titawusombulula tinsayeya tekufaka lunswinyo kubangcolisi futsi kwente kube lula kubita umngcolisi akhokhe.

src_text: Kabinete thabetše kgatelopele ye kgolo ye fihleletšwego ke bontši bja dikgoro tša mmušo go hloma ditheong tša tšona tlhako ye yeo sale amogelwa ka 2019 gore phethagatšwe..     Ga sale go tloga fao, dikgoro tše ntši di thomile go hloma dinyakwa tše bohlokwa tša pholisi ye go hlahla mananeo thupetšo ao nepišitšwego basading, go baswa le bathong ba go phela ka bogolofadi.
tgt_text: Lenchubomgomo yentiwa ngekuhambisana neMtsetfo Wavelonkhe Wemanti, wanga-1998 (Umtsetfo 36 wanga-1998).

src_text: Kabinete dirile gape le boipiletšo bja tekolo ya mošomo le dipego tše tiišeleditšwego letsogo, kudukudu go tše dingwe tša dikgoro tšeo go fihla gabjale di sa kago tša fa dipego.
tgt_text: Umbiko Weluhlakamsebenti Lwekuhlela Tekuphendvula Kutebulili, Kulandzelela, Kulinganisa kanye Neluhlakamsebenti Lwelucwaningomabhuku.

src_text: Dipoledišano tša Baswa go Hlompha Nelson Mandela (NMYD).
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi itfole umbiko wenchubekelembili mayelana neLuhlakamsebenti Lwekuhlela Tekuphendvula Kutebulili, Kulandzelela, Kulinganisa kanye Neluhlakamsebenti Lwelucwaningomabhuku.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše NMYD go kgatlampana ngwaga ka ngwaga go thoma ka.
NMYD ya pulamadibogo tla swarwa go thoma ka la 7 go fihla ka la 20 Mosegamanye.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyitfokotele inchubekelembili leyentiwe ngematiko ahulumende lamanyenti ekufakeni loluhlakamsebenti etinhlelweni tayo lolwemukelwa nga-2019 kutsi luphunyeleliswe.

src_text: Le ke lesolo la Mopresidente go nea baswa ba Kontinente ye monyetla wa go tsenela dipoledišano tše di ba agago mererong ye ba amago kudu..     Dipoledišano tše, tšeo di tla bego di bolela ka senatla sa rena sa boditšhabatšhaba bago Mopresidente wa Maloba Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela – di tla thoma ka dipoledišano tše ka maikemišetšo go ruta batho ka go itlwaetša boetapele bja  potego mo Afrika.
Dipoledišano tše di tla nea baswa monyetla wa go nyetlela ba bangwe ka bohwa bjo humilego bja ditšo tša bona.
tgt_text: Kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi ematiko lamanyenti asemise ngemumo tinchubomgomo letibomabekwembili tekukhombindlela tinhlelo tekuhlanganisa leticondze bomake, lusha kanye nebantfu labaphila ngekukhubateka.

src_text: Lesolo le le tla tiišeletša le dikamano tša magareng ga batho go lebeletšwe baswa ba kontinente ye.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi seyimemetele kutsi kuciniswe sandla ekulandzeleleni nasekubikeni, ikakhulukati ngalamanye alamatiko lasengakabiki.

src_text: Kgoro ya Basadi, Baswa le Batho ba go Phela ka Bogolofadi tla fana ka dintlha ka botlalo tša lenaneo le ditiragalo tšeo di tla bago gona ka moragonyana.
tgt_text: Inkhulumomphendvulwane Yelusha Ka-Nelson Mandela (i-NMYD).

src_text: Pego ya 2021/22 ya Ngwaga ka Ngwaga ya go Bewa Leihlo ga Bodiragatši ka Matlafatšo ya Basadi le Tekatekano ya Bong, Tlhabollo ya Baswa le Tlhohleletšo ya Ditokelo tša Batho ba go Phela ka Bogolofadi.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi icinisekise i-NMYD kutsi yentiwe njalo ngemnyaka kusukela nga-.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše pego ya ngwaga ka ngwaga ya go bewa leihlo ga bodiragatši go lebeletšwe pego ya 2021/22 ya go matlafatšwa ga basadi, baswa le batho ba go phela ka bogolofadi.
tgt_text: Kwetfulwa kwale-NMYD kutawuba mhla ti-7 kuya kumhla tinge-20 Kholwane.

src_text: Pego ye latišiša mohlala wa ditaetšo tše bohlokwa tša tlhohleletšo ya tekatekano, maemo mešomo, taolo le go kgatha tema ga dihlopha tše tša batho ka gare ga ditiragalo tša dikgoro le makalakgwebo go laolwa ke mmušo.
tgt_text: Lona ngumtamo weLihhovisi laMengameli wekunika lusha lwaleLivekati inkhundla yekukhulumisana ngenkhulumomphendvulwane mayelana netindzaba letibatsintsako.

src_text: Pego ye ngwadilwe ka go bapetšwa le tlhako ya bolekanyetši bjo bo hlamilwego goya ka bong, phetleko ya mošomo le botlhakiši yeo amogetšwego ke Kabinete ka     Melaokakanywa.
Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa Maphelo le Polokego ya tša Meepo.
tgt_text: Letinkhulumomphendvulwane – letitawusima kulichawe letfu lemave emhlaba Mengameli  wesikhatsi lesengcile Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela – titawucala tinkhulumo tekujulisa lisiko lebuholi lobunenkhambo lenhle yekutiphatsa e-Afrika.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go phatlalatšwa ga Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa Maphelo le Polokego ya tša Maphelo gore setšhaba se fe ditshwayotshwayo.
tgt_text: Titawunika bantfu labasha ematfuba ekucobelelana ngelifa labo lelinemasiko lanotsile.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo šetšane le go kaonafatša maphelo le polokego ya bašomedi ba meepo, go akaretšwa le tikologo yeo go yona ditiragalo tša meepo di phethagalago.
tgt_text: Lomtamo utawuphindze futsi ucinisekise budlelwane bebantfu (kulomunye nakulomunye) emkhatsini welusha lwalelivekati.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo fetoša Molao wa bjale wa Maphelo le Polokego ya tša Meepo, 1996 (Molao 29 wa 1996).
tgt_text: Litiko letaBomake, Lusha Nebantfu Labanekukhubateka litawuniketa imininingwane yeluhlelo lwalemikhosi esikhatsini lesitako..     Umbiko Wekulandzelela Kusebenta Wemnyaka 2021/22 lomayelana neKuhlonyiswa Kwabomake Nekulingana Ngebulili, Nekutfutfukiswa Kwelusha kanye neKukhutsatwa Kwemalungelo Ebantfu Labaphila Nekukhubateka.

src_text: Diphetošo tše di fetekilwego magareng ga tše dingwe, di fana ka tlhathollo ya mangwe mareo ka Molaong wo, di tiišeletša tlhako ya taolo ya tša maphelo le polokego le go di bapiša le ditlwaedi tše kaonekaone tša boditšhabatšhaba mabapi le polokego meepong.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi itfole umbiko wekulandzelela kusebenta wemnyaka 2021/22 lomayelana nekuhlonyiswa kwabomake, lusha kanye nebantfu labaphila nekukhubateka.

src_text: Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa Molaotheo wa bo-18 wa.
tgt_text: Lombiko ulandzelela tinkhomba letinkhulu tekukhutsatwa kwetekulingana, lizinga lemisebenti nebuniyo kanye nekuhlanganyela kwalamacembu kumisebenti yematiko kanye nasetikhungweni tahulumende.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše phatlalatšo ya Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa 2022 wa bo-18 wa Molaotheo gore setšhaba se fe ditshwayotshwayo tša sona le gape gore Tona ya Toka le Tshokollo ya Bagolegwa, Morena Ronald Lamola kgone go fana ka tsebišo ye nago le dintlha ka botlalo tša diphetošo tšeo di šišinywago Molaotheong..     Molaokakanywa wo fetoša Karolo 6(1) ya Molaotheo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa wa 1996, wo bolelago gore maleme semmušo 11 Afrika Borwa ke Sepedi, Sesotho, Setswana, siSwati, Tshivenḓa, Xitsonga, Afrikaans, English, isiNdebele, isiXhosa le isiZulu..     Diphetošo tše di tla dira gore Polelo ka Diatla ya Afrika Borwa (SASL) lemogwe bjalo ka polelo ya semmušo ya bo-12 ya naga ye ebile tla iša pele kamogelo ya yona ya setšo le go netefatša ditokelo tša go lekalekana go MaAfrika Borwa ka moka, go sa kgathale bogolofadi bja bona.
tgt_text: Lombiko uhlanganiswa mayelana nelwabiwomali lwekuhlela tekuphendvula kutebulili, kulandzelela, kulinganisa kanye neluhlakamsebenti lweLucwaningomabhuku lolwemukelwa yiKhabhinethi nga-     Imitsetfosivivinyo.

src_text: Kgoro ya Thuto ya Motheo šetše lemoga SASL bjalo ka polelo ya letswele     Ditiragalo tšeo di Tlago.
tgt_text: Umtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibiyela Temphilo Netekuphepha Emayini.

src_text: Beke ya Tšhireletšo ya Bana.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kushicilelwa kweMtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchitjelwa Kwetemphilo Netekuphepha Emayini kute kutsi ummango uphawule ngawo.

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla keteka Beke ya Bosetšhaba ya Tšhireletšo ya Bana go thoma ka la 29 Mopitlo go fihla ka la 4 Phupu 2022 ka fase ga morero wo: “A re šireletšeng Bana nakong ye ya COVID-19 le go fetela pele”..     Mo gare ga beke, šedi ya moswananoši tla lebišwa godimo ga tlhobaboroko ya bosetšhaba ya go ima ga ditšwamahlalagading, yeo hlatlogetšego godimo nakong ya COVID-19 ka ditšwamahlagading bao ba beleilego masea ka..     Kabinete dirile boipiletšo bja mohlakanelwa go tšwa go batswadi, mekgatlo ye lego setšhabeng, dihlopha tša sedumedi le setšhaba ka kakaretšo gore be ngatana ye tee go thuša go fokotša tlhatlogo ya go ima ga ditšwamahlalagading.
tgt_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uhlose kwenta kancono temphilo netekuphepha tebasebenti basemayini, kufaka ekhatsi simondzawo lapho kwentiwa khona imisebenti yasemayini.

src_text: Foramo ya Bolefase ya Ikonomi (WEF).
tgt_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uchibela Umtsetfo Wetemphilo Netekuphepha Emayini, wanga-1996 (Umtsetfo we-29 wa-1996).

src_text: Afrika Borwa kgatha tema go WEF gola Davos-Klosters, Switzerland go thoma ka la 22 go fihla ka la 26 Mopitlo 2022, ka fase ga morero wo: “Re šoma mmogo, go bušetša potego sekeng”..     Afrika Borwa hlompha monyetla wa go ba karolo ya tharollo le go nyetlela naga tše dingwe maitemogelo rena foramong ya bolefase.
tgt_text: Letichibiyelo letibuyeketiwe tiniketa, emkhatsini walokunye, kucaciswa kwaleminye imicondvo lekuloMtsetfo, ucinise luhlakamsebenti lwekulawula temphilo netekuphepha uphindze futsi uwente uhambisane nekusebenta ezingeni lemhlaba leliphakeme kakhulu mayelana netekuphepha etimayini.

src_text: Go ba gona ga naga ya rena kua WEF go bohlokwa go godiša seriti sa rena bjalo ka naga ya dipeeletšo lefaseng ka bophara, ka go nyetlela lefase ka bophara ponelopele ya bokamoso le go bonagatša ditlhabollo tše diswa ka mo nageng.
Kgwedi ya Baswa.
tgt_text: Umtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibiyela Umtsetfosisekelo Kwelishumi nasiphohlongo wanga-2022 .

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše Lenaneo la Kgwedi ya Baswa la 2022 ka fase ga morero wo: “Tlhohleletšo ya mekgwa ya boiphedišo ya go tšea telele le bopelotelele bja baswa go fihlelela bokamoso bjo kaone”.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kushicilelwa kweMtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchitjelwa  KweMtsetfosisekelo Kwelishumi nasiphohlongo Kwanga-2022 kute kutsi sive siphawule ngawo nekutsi Indvuna Yetebulungiswa Nekucondziswa Kwesimilo, Mnu.

src_text: Letšatši la semmušo la Baswa le tla ketekwa gola Kapa Bohlabela..     Letšatši le ke anibesari yabo-46 ya 16 Phupu 1976 ya megwanto ya baswa kgahlanong le go gapeletšwa go ithuta dithuto ka moka ka leleme la Afrikaans..     Ka moya wa Phupu 1976, Kabinete dirile boipiletšo go baswa ba naga ye go kalokana le tlhotlo ya tlhokego ya mešomo yeo golelago godimo basweng ka go kgatha tema mananeong go ba hlabolla go swana le boithutelamošomo le boithutela maitememogelo mošomo.
tgt_text: Ronald Lamola, anikete tatiso nemininingwane mayelana naletichibiyelo teMtsetfosisekelo letiphakanyisiwe..     LoMtsetfosisekelo uchibiyela Sigaba 6(1) seMtsetfosisekelo waseRiphabhulikhi yeNingizimu Afrika wanga-1996, lomemetela kutsi tilwimi taseNingizimu Afrika leti-11 letisetsetfweni Sepedi, Sesothoisutfu, Setswana, Siswati, Tshivenda, Xitsonga, Sibhunu, Singisi, Sindebele, siXhosa kanye nesiZulu..     Letichibiyelo temukela Lulwimi Lwetimphawu LwaseNingizimu Afrika (i-SASL) kutsi lulwimi lwe-12 lolusemtsetfweni lwalelive futsi lutawutfutfukisa kwemukelwa kwalo kutemasiko luphindze futsi lucinisekise kuba nemalungelo lalinganako kubo bonkhe bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika, ngekunganaki kubanekukhubateka kwabo.

src_text: Mmušo hlamile mananeo go thekga go thwalwa ga baswa le tlhomo ya mešomo ya lebakanyana.
tgt_text: Litiko Letemfundvo Lesisekelo selivele lemukela i-SASL njengelulwimi lwasekhaya     Imikhosi Letako.

src_text: Dikgwebo le tšona di hlohleletšwa go gokagoketša baswa ba bangwe ba bantši mešomong ka go ba hlolela dibaka tša mešomo..     Lenaneo la baswa la kgwedi ka moka ya Phupu le akaretša ditiragalo ka moka go thoma ka go thakgolwa ga lesolo la baswa la makgoraditsela, go tsebagatšwa ga Lenaneo la Moemedi wa Leswaokgwebo la NYDA le bontši bja go thomišwa ga Ditirelo tša Bosetšhaba tša Baswa go potologa naga ka bophara..     Tona Kantorong ya Mopresidente ya Basadi, Baswa le Bao ba Phelago ka Bogolofadi tlare go se goye kae hlatholla lenaneo ka botlalo.
tgt_text: Liviki Lekuvikelwa Kwebantfwana.

src_text: Ditiragalo ka moka tša baswa go letetšwe gore di obamele ditshepedišo tša maphelo tša COVID-.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika itawugubha Liviki Lekuvikelwa Kwebantfwana kusukela mhla tinge-29 Inkhwekhweti kuya kumhla ti-4 Inhlaba 2022 ngaphasi kwalengcikitsi: “Asivikele Bantfwana ngesikhatsi se-COVID-19 neKwendlula lapho”..     Kuleliviki, kutawunakwa kakhulu ngalokukhetsekile ludzaba lwavelonkhe lwekukhulelwa kwelusha, lokwakhuphuka ngemandla lokwandlondlobala kakhulu ngesikhatsi se-COVID-19 lapho khona batala kakhulu nga-..     Ikhabhinethi icele kutsi kube khona kubambisana kubatali, kummango, emacembu ebetenkholo kanye nemmango ngebubanti bawo kutsi basite kube netingucuko ekukhulelweni kwelusha.

src_text: Samiti ya Dinaga tša go Laolwa ke Magoši.
tgt_text: Iforamu Yetemnotfo Yemhlaba (i-WEF).

src_text: Mmušo, ka tšhomišano le Setheo sa Bosetšhaba sa Ntlo ya Magoši tla swara Samiti ya Dinaga tša go Laolwa ke Magoši ka Labohlano, 27 le ka Mokibelo, 28 Mopitlo go rerišana ka merero ya go amana le taolo ya naga..     Tše ka moka di akaretša tshepedišo ya go fetišetša dinaga tša go laola ke magošigo tšwa Mmušong goya go beng ba tšona ba maloka maleba lego taba ye bohlokwa go matlafatša batho ba go tšwa dinagamagaeng.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika itawuhlanganyela ku-WEF eDavos-Klosters, eSwitzerland kusukela mhla tinge-22 kuya kumhla tinge-26 Inkhwekhweti 2022, ngaphasi kwengcikitsi letsi: “Sisebenta Ngekubambisana, Sibuyisa Litsemba”..     INingizimu Afrika itfokotela litfuba lekuba yincenye yalesisombululo nekuphindze futsi yabelane kuleforamu yemave emhlaba ngaloko lesihlangabetene nako.

src_text: Ditiragalo tša go dira gore batho ba palelwe ke go ba beng ba dinaga ba semmušo mo dinageng tšeo ba dulago go tsona ko magaeng ga sesefatše fela ditokelo tša batho bao tša go bale naga ye lego ya bona eupša fokotša le mabokgoni bona go šomiša yona naga yeo go kaonafatša maphelo bona le maemo bona ditšhelete     Melaetša.
tgt_text: Bukhona betfu ku-WEF kukhulisa lidvumela letfu njengendzawo yekwenta lutjalomali, sabelana nemhlaba ngembononchanti wetfu welikusasa kanye nekuphakamisa tintfutfuko letinsha ngekhatsi kulelive.

src_text: DitebogišoKabinete lebiša ditebogišo tša yona le go lakaletša mahlatse le mahlogonolo go: Mme Leanne Manas, Modiragatši wa Lenaneo la Mesong la SABC la Morning Live, ge amogeditšwe sefoka sa Botswerere bja Bosetšhaba sa go bitšwa Knight of France go tšwa France ka Labobedi, 17 Phupu 2022, ka go kgatha tema ga gagwe go bongwadi, bobegaditaba le magoro mangwe kakaretšo go fapafapana..     Mahloko Kabinete lebiša mahloko yona go malapa le go bagwera ba: Ntate Mpho Moerane (52), Meyaraphethiši wa maloba wa Toropokgolo ya Johannesburg, yo gape bego le mafolofolo mo dipolotiking bophelo bja gagwe ka moka le mohlankedi wa batho ba Johannesburg.
tgt_text: Inyanga Yelusha.

src_text: Pele tlo thwalwa go ba Meyaraphethiši hlanketše setšhaba bjalo ka Leloko la Komiti ya Meyara ya go šoma ka Tikologo le Ditirelo tša Mananeokgoparara.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iluvumile Luhlelo Lwenyanga Yelusha lwanga-2022 ngaphasi kwalengcikitsi: “Kukhutsata tindlela tekutiphilisa letisimeme nekucina kwebantfu labasha kute babe nelikusasa lelincono”.

src_text: Ngaka Deborah Fraser (56), seopedi sa mmino wa sedumedi yo thopilego difoka tše mmalwa yo malobanyana mo hlomphilwego ka Bongaka bja Filosofi ka Mmino wo Galalelago ka Christian Leadership Academy.Ngaka Namane Magau (70), serutegi sa go hlomphega kudu le leloko leo le hlomphegago la Lekgotla la Babolokedi la Khansele ya Bosetšhaba ya AIDS ya Afrika Borwa.Ntate Mike Schüssler (60), raikonomi wa go tsebega kudu wa Moafrika Borwa yo bego le mmotegi wa intasteri ye ebile le yena bego kgona go botša batho ka se le sela mabapi le seemo sa ikonomi ya Afrika Borwa.Ntate Jamie Bartlett (56), modiragatši wa go ratega kudu, wa go thopa difoka tše mmalwa tša difala tša Afrika Borwa le bodiragatši bja thelebišene, yo bego tsebega kudu ka ditema tšeo di bapetšego bjalo ka Mike O'Reilly go Isidingo le David Genaro go Rhythm City.Kabinete le yona bile le Mopresidente Ramaphosa go lebiša mahloko mmušong le setšhabeng sa United Arab Emirates (UAE) morago ga go hlokagala ga Lešika la ka Bogošing Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan (73), Mopresidente wa UAE      Bao ba Thwetšwego MešomongBatho ka moka bao ba thwetšwego mešomong mangwalo bona dithuto tlo netefatšwa le go tiišeletšwa ka tsela ye maleba.
tgt_text: Lilanga Lelusha Lelisemtsetfweni litawukhunjulwa eMphumalanga Kapa.

src_text: Ntate Bongani Sinenhlanhla Dladla bjalo ka Mohlankediphethišimogolwane wa Lekgotla la Tlhabollo ya Intasteri ya Kago.
Ntate Shabeer Hamid Khan bjalo ka Mmalamatlotlopharephare kua Matlotlong Bosetšhaba.
tgt_text: Lomnyaka lona utawuba ngumkhosi we-46 wekubungata umhla ti-16 Inhlaba 1976 wetibhelu tetitjudeni taseSoweto ngesikhatsi bantfu labasha balwa nekuhlisibetwa ngeSibhunu ngumbuso welubandlululo kutsi bafundziswe ngaso etikolweni.

src_text: Mme Mendoe Ntswahlana bjalo ka Mohlankedimogolwane wa Dithekišetšano kua Matlotlong Bosetšhaba.
tgt_text: Ngekwemoya weNhlaba yanga-1976, Ikhabhinethi imeme bonkhe bantfu labasha kutsi babukane nensayeya yekukhula kwelizinga lekweswelakala kwemisebenti ngekutsi bahlanganyele etinhlelweni tekutitfutfukisa njengetemfundzamakhono emsebentini netekusebentela kutfola sipiliyoni emsebentini.

src_text: Kabinete kwanetše go thwalwa ga badiradikgopelo bao ba latelago go tlatša dikgoba tša mešomo tša Lekgotla la Balaodi ba Sekhwama sa Bohlokwa sa Enetši     Ntate Mosimaneotsile Jim Besnaar; (ii)    Mme Unati Nombakuse-Figlan.
Ikonomi.
tgt_text: Temnotfo.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše dikgatelopele tša moragorago tše kaonafetšego ka magato go rarolla seemo sa naga ye ao nepilego go hlohleletša kgolo ya ikonomi.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyakwamukela lokungenelela lokuhle lokusandza kwenteka lokuhlose kuvuselela kukhula kwemnotfo.

src_text: Goya ka dipalopalo tša moragorago tša tlhokego ya mešomo go tšwa go ba Dipalopalo tša Afrika Borwa, tlhokego ya mešomo theogetše fase go tloga go.
tgt_text: Ngekwetinombolo letisandza kukhishwa letikhishwe beteLubalobalo TaseNingizimu Afrika, kuswelakala kwematfuba emsebenti kunciphe kusuka kumaphesenti la-.

src_text: 3% kotareng ya bone ya 2021 go fihla go.
tgt_text: 3 kulekota yesine yemnyaka we-2021 kwaya kumaphesenti la-.

src_text: 5% kotareng ya mathomo ya.
tgt_text: 5 kukota yekucala yemnyaka we-.

src_text: Palo ya batho ka moka bao ba bego ba sa šome nakong ya ge go dirwa dipalopalo theogetše fase kotareng ya bobedi ka go latelana.
tgt_text: Lokukhula kwemazinga ematfuba ekungacashwa kunciphe kwalandzelana emakota lamabili.

src_text: Mešomo ye mentši bile gona makaleng mešomo ya setšhaba le ya leago, mešomong ya bohlami le ya kgwebišano..     Palomoka ya Letseno la ka Nageng (GDP) kotareng ya mathomo ya 2022 goletše godimo ka.
tgt_text: Umkhakha wetematfuba emsebenti lozuze kakhulu ngilowetinsita temmango netenhlalakahle, tekukhucita netekuhwebelana.

src_text: 9% gomme tlhatlogo ye bušetša bogolo bja ikonomi ya gaborena go swana le ka nako ya pele naga ye welwa ke leuba.
tgt_text: Linani lemikhicito yasekhaya likhule nge-.

src_text: Mo kotareng ye, lefapha la bohlami be le lona le legolo la go šoma bokaone ikonoming ka tlhatlogo ya tšweletšo ya petroleamo le dikhemikhale, dijo le dino, le tšhipi le metšhene.
tgt_text: 9% kukota yekucala yemnyaka we-2022 lokutsatsa bukhulu bemnotfo wakitsi kuwuyise esikhatsini sangembi kwekucala kwalobhubhane.

src_text: Ditlhatlogo tše di kaonafetšego di tloga di laetša botse gore ikonomi ya gaborena santše tiile maatla le gore magato go swana le Leano la go Agwa Leswa ga Ikonomi le go Bušetšwa Sekeng ga yona le tloga le nale mošito.
tgt_text: Ngalesikhatsi salekota, umkhakha wetekukhicita ngiwo lowasebenta kahle lowaba nekukhula kumikhicito yetephethilomu neyemakhemikhali, yetekudla neyetinatfo, neyemamethali neyetemishini.

src_text: Kabinete dira boipiletšo go mang le mang go thekga dikgwebo tša ka mo nageng le diintasteri ka go reka ditšweletšwa le ditirelo tša go tšwa ka mo nageng..     Kabinete amogetše sephetho ka kemedi ya kelo ya dikoloto ebago S&P Global go sekaseka ponelopele ya Afrika Borwa ya kelo ya dikoloto go tloga maemong go tielela goya maemong go kgahliša.
tgt_text: Lokuzuza loku lokungakendluleli kukhomba kutsi umnotfo wakitsi usatawuhlala usebenta ngemandla nekutsi kungenelela lokufana neLuhlelo Lekwakha Kabusha Nelekuvuselela Umnotfo lutfola emandla.

src_text: Kemedi ye ya kelo ya dikoloto netefaditše kharensi ya kelo ya dikoloto ya nako ye telele ya dinagadišele le ya ka mo nageng go tlogelwa maemong BB minus le BB ka go latelana.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi yenta lubito kuwonkhewonkhe kutsi kusekelwe emabhizinisi asekhaya netimboni ngekutsenga imikhicito netinsita talapha ekhaya.

src_text: Seemo seo se Gakalago sa Ditheko.
Leuba la Bolwetši bja Coronavirus (COVID-19) le dithulano tšeo di tšwelago pele lefaseng di bile le seabe se še šoro dithekong tšeo di gaketšego tša bophelo lefaseng ka bophara.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyasamukela futsi lesincumo se-ejensi yekulinganisa emazinga i-S&P Global sekubuyeketa simo seNingizimu Afrika sekukweleta – kusuka kulesinekusimama kuya kulesihle kakhulu.

src_text: MaAfrika Borwa le bona ba hlobaetšwa ke ditheko tšeo di nyologelago godimo tša dibešeletšwa, dijo le tše dingwe tše bohlokwa..     Re swanetše go swarišana ka moka ga rena, re thušane le go seketša didirišwa tša rena mo nakong ye ye boima.
tgt_text: Le-ejensi yekulinganisa emazinga futsi icinisekisile kutsi lesimo semazinga ekukweleta esikhatsi lesidze semali yasekhaya neyemave angaphandle sihlala siku-BB minus naku-BB ngekulandzelana kwawo.

src_text: Mmušo le ona leka ka botšohle go imolla mang le mang, kudukudu bahloki.

Panka ya gaborena ya Afrika Borwa ya Resefe ya go šoma gabotsebotse, ya go tielela le ya go ikema gare thuša go šireletša setšhaba sa gaborena kgahlanong le ditlamorago tše mpe tša infleišene ka go thea infleišene gore be ka fase ga kelo ya fasefase; go ba ka fase ga kelo yeo dinaga tše dingwe tše itemogelago yona ka motsotso wo.
tgt_text: Tindleko tekuphila.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše sephetho sa Matlotlo Bosetšhaba sa go fana ka koketšo ya phokoletšo ya Lebikakaretšo ya Dibešeletšwa (GFL).
tgt_text: Bhubhane Weligciwane Lekhorona (i-COVID-19) kanye nalokungcubutana lokuchubekako kwemave emhlaba kube nemtselela lomubi kutindleko tekuphila emhlabeni wonkhe.

src_text: GFL fokoditšwe ka  50 lithareng ka Moranang le ka Mopitlo, ebile phokoletšo ye tla tšwelapele go tloga ka la 1 Phupu go fihla ka la 6 Mosegamanye.
tgt_text: Bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika nabo bakhatsatekile ngalokwenyuka kwetindleko temafutsa etigitjelwa, tekudla netetintfo letimcoka..     Kufuneka sonkhe sibambisane, sisitane futsi sivikele tinsita takitsi kulesikhatsi lesimatima.
Hulumende wenta konkhe lokusemandleni kunika lusito kuwo wonkhe umuntfu, kakhulu kulabo labaphuyile.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše sephetho sa Khomišene ya Diphenkgišano go bea leihlo ditheko tša dijo tša motheo, kudukudu peakanyetšo ya gore dikgwebo di swanetše go fahlela ka mabaka go kwagala ge di nyološa ditheko.
tgt_text: Libhangengodla lakitsi LaseNingizimu Afrika lelisebenta kahle, lelinemandla nalelitimele liyancedza kuvikela ummango kulokucekelwa phansi kwekwehla kwemandla emali ngekuwagcina angekhatsi kwebubanti lobuncane lobuhlosiwe; lobungaphasi kakhulu kulabo lobentekako ngalesikhatsi kulamanye emave..     Ikhabhinethi iyasamukela sincumo Semgcinimfa Wavelonkhe sekungeta sikhatsi lesibekiwe sekunciphisa Intsela Yephethilomu Jikelele (i-GFL).

src_text: Foramo ya Kgwebo ya Afrika Borwa le Japan.
tgt_text: Le-GFL yancishiswa nge-R. 50 ilitha enyangeni yaMabasa neyeNkhwekhweti, futsi itawuchubeka yelulwe kusuka mhla lu-1 Inhlaba kuya kumhla ti-6 Kholwane.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše dipoelo tša Foramo ya Kgwebo ya moragorago ya Afrika Borwa le Japan, yeo kwanetšego lenaneo la phišegelo ya mošomo leo le akaretšago tšhomišanommogo godimo ga go hlongwa ga diintasteri tša go šomiša dimatheriale tša tlhago, ditheknolotši tša difatanaga tša mohlagase le haedrotšene ya go mpshafatšega..     Foramo ye kwanetše go swara pontšho ya mebileng ka dikgokagano tša bidio go laetša menyetla ya Afrika Borwa go dikgwebo tša Japan ka bontši, tlhabollo ya mabokgoni ka gare ga intasteri ya naga ye ya difatanaga, magoro ao lego gona mošomo godimo ga dibaka tša bohlami le neelano ya maitemogelo sethekniki.

Japan ke ye nngwe ya bagwebišani ba bohlokwa kudu ba naga ya gaborena ebile ke yona eteletšego pele dipeeletšo mafapheng mmalwa Afrika Borwa, go thoma ka lefapha la difatanaga go fihla ka metšhenekgoparara yeo gatetšego pele ya tša meepo, le gape go dikgwebo tša temo go fihla ka ditirelo tša ditšhelete.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi futsi isamukele sincumo Sekhomishini Yetekucudzelana sekuhlala icaphele kakhulu tindleko tetintfo letitsatfwa njengekudla lokumcoka, kakhulu sibonelelo sekutsi emabhizinisi kufuneka anikete bufakazi lobuvakalako bekwenyusa tindleko..     Umhlangano Wetemabhizinisi emkhatsini kweJapan neNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše gape go hlongwa ga Lenaneo la Baromelantle ba Bathobaso ka Kgoro ya Kgwebišano, Intasteri le Diphenkgišano (the dtic), go kgobokantšha mmogo difeme tša go laolwa ke bathobaso tšeo gabjale di romelago ka ntle diphahlo tša go tšweletšwa ka mo nageng ye go ya dikarolong tše dingwe tša lefase.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyamukele lemiphumela yakamuva Yemhlangano Wetemabhizinisi emkhatsini kweJapan neNingizimu Afrika, lovumelene ngeluhlelo lwemsebenti lolunemandla lolufaka kusebentisana ekukhuliseni umnotfo ngekusebentisa emandla lahlantekile, buchwepheshe betimoto tagezi kanye neyehayidrojini lehlantekile..     Lomhlangano futsi uvumelene kutsi kube “nembukiso” we-inthanethi lotawuveta ematfuba eNingizmu Afrika kumabhizinisi lamanyenti aseJapan, kutfutfukiswa kwemakhono kulemboni yetetigitjelwa yalapha ekhaya, kumikhakha leyehlukene yetematfuba ekukhicita kanye nekutsi kube nekuniketana ngemakhono..     I-Japan ingulabanye bebalingani betfu labamcoka kakhulu kutekutsengiselana futsi ihamba embili ekutjaleni timali kumikhakha leminengi yaseNingizimu Afrika, lehlukahlukene lesukela kuyetetigitjelwa iye kutemishini yasetimayini lehamba embili, nalesuka kumabhizinisi etekulima kuya kuwetetinsita tetimali.

src_text: Lenaneo le le tla kgontšha go abelanwa ga tshedimošo, maitemogelo le tsebo ya mabokgoni, ebile le putla godimo ga dikatlego tša Lenaneo la Bahlomi ba Dikgwebo ba Bathobaso (BIS)..     Enetši.
