src_text: Ditaetši di dirilwe le bakgathatema ba maleba bao ba nago le kgahlego mo tlhabollong le matlafatšong ya bafsa ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: Luhlaka luniketa ngetinkhomba letisihlanu letisezingeni lelisetulu letihambisana netinsika te-NYP.

src_text: Tshedimošo tla kgoboketšwa ka go aroganywa ka dikarolo go ya ka mengwaga, bong, bogolofadi, sehlopha sa merafe le tikologo ya thutafase ya ditsenogare tše.
tgt_text: Letinkomba tentiwa nalabatsintsekako labafanele labanenshisekelo ekutfutfukisweni nasekuniketeni kwelusha emandla eveni.

src_text: Dikgato tše tša go dira ditlhahlobo di tla dirwa ka mafelong ka moka mmušo, ka ditheong ka moka le lekaleng la praebete.
tgt_text: Kugcogcwa kwemininingwane kutohlukaniswa ngekweminyaka yebudzala, bulili, kukhubateka, ngekwemacembu ebuhlanga kanye nesimo sendzawo salokungenelela.

src_text: Dipego tša tšona di tla dirwa kotareng ye nngwe le ye nngwe gomme tša phatlalatšwa gabedi ka ngwaga.
tgt_text: Lokucaphela kutokwentiwa kuto tonkhe tinhlaka tahulumende, mikhakha kanye netinkampani letitimele.

src_text: Tlhako ya Pholisi ya Peakanyo ye Kopantšwego.
tgt_text: Imibiko itokhicitwa njalo ngekota futsi ishicilelwe kabili ngemnyaka.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše Tlhako ya Pholisi ya Peakanyo ye Kopantšwego ya mmušo, yeo nyakago go šogana le mafokodi peakanyo ya pholisi ao utollotšwego mo lenaneong la peakanyo la gonabjale.
tgt_text: Luhlaka Lwenchubomgomo Yekuhlela Lokudidiyelwe.

src_text: Ditsenogare tšeo di šišintšwego di tla re gare ga tše dingwe tša šogana le tlhokego ya tlhopo ya peakanyo mo dikarolong tše tharo tša mmušo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ilugunyatile Luhlaka Lwenchubomgomo Yekuhlela Lokudidiyelwe kuhulumende, loluhlose kubukana namagebe labonakele ekuhleleni incubomgomo eluhlelweni lolukhona manje lwekuhlela.

src_text: Ditsenogare di tla tsebiša mokgwa wa tlhahlobo wo theilwego go bohlatse.
tgt_text: Kungenelela lokuhlongotwako phakatsi kwalokunye kubukana nekubate kwekuhlelwa kwekucondziswa ngekhatsi kwetinhlaka letintsatfu tahulumende.

src_text: Tlhako ya pholisi tsebišitše gape kakanyo ye bonolo ka peakanyo ya nako ye telele go ya magareng le peakanyo ya nako ye kopana go phatlalala le mmušo tla šomela go thoma dimpshafatšo tša melao go kaonafatša kopano le kakanyo mo peakanyong le tlhahlobong ya mmušo.
tgt_text: Kungenelela kutokwetfula indlela yekucaphela lesekelwe ebufakazini.

src_text: Tumelelo ya Tumelelano ya go Thongwa ga Mokgatlo wa Dihlare tša Seafrika (AMA).
tgt_text: Luhlaka lwenchubomgomo luphindze lwetfule kusho ngembili lokulula ngekuhlela sikhatsi lesidze kuya kulesisemkhatsini nesikhatsi lesifishane kuhulumende wonkhe.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go saenwa ga Tumelelano ya go Thongwa ga AMA le go išwa ga yona Palamenteng go ka dumelelwa.
tgt_text: Itosebentela kwetfula tingucuko temtsetfo kuze kutsi kwentiwe ncono kuhambisana nekusho ngembili ekuhleleni nekucaphela kwahulumende.

src_text: Se se tla phetha tumelelano yeo amogelwago ke Kopano ya Tumelelano ya Afrika ka.
tgt_text: Kugunyatwa KweSivumelwane Sekusungulwa Kwenhlangano Yemitsi Yase-Afrika (i-AMA).

src_text: Tumelelano thoma semmušo AMA ya kontinente.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kusayinwa kweSivumelwane Sekusungulwa kwe-AMA kanye nekwetfulwa kwaso ePhalamende kuze sigunyatwe.

src_text: Mokgatlo tla laola ditšweletšwa tša dihlare, gomme wa kaonafatša polokego le bokgoni bja ditšweletšwa tša dihlare ka kontinenteng.
tgt_text: Loku kutokwenta kutsi kusebente sivumelwane lesamukelwa yi-African Union Assembly nga-.

src_text: Go saenwa le go dumelelwa ga tumelelano ye go tla kaonafatša boikgafo bja Afrika Borwa mo lefaseng le mo kontinenteng mo go matlafatšeng lenaneo la taolo ya kontinente mo go ditšweletšwa tša maphelo.
tgt_text: Lesivumelwane sisungula ngalokusemtsetfweni i-AMA yalelivekati.

src_text: Pego ka ga Lenaneo la Tlhohleletšo ya Motšhelo la Phethagatšo ya Dinyakišišo le Tlhabollo (R&D) – 2019/20 le 2020/.
tgt_text: I-ejensi itolawula imikhicito yetekwelapha, futsi itfutfukise kuphepha nekusebenta ngemphumelelo kwemikhicito yetekwelapha yalelivekati.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa ga Lenaneo la tlhohleletšo ya Motšhelo la R&D Palamenteng mo mengwageng ye mebedi ya go feta (2019/20 le 2020/21).
tgt_text: Kusayinwa nekucinisekiswa kwalesivumelwane kukhombisa kutibophelela kweNingizimu Afrika kutivumelwane temhlaba jikelele netalelivekati letimayelana nekucinisa imitsetfo yalelivekati lelawula imikhicito yalo yetemphilo.

src_text: Se se sepelelana le karolo ya 11D (17) ya Molao wa Motšhelo wa Letseno, wa 1962 (Molao wa 58 wa 1962), woo nyakago go alwa ga dipego tše ka Palamenteng.
tgt_text: Umbiko Ngekusebenta Kweluhlelo Lwekucwaninga Nekutfutfukisa (i-R&D) Luhlelo Lwekuhlomulisa Intsela - 2019/20 kanye na-2020/.

src_text: Lenaneo la tlhohleletšo ya motšhelo le nyaka go hlohleletša dikhamphani tša praebete go beeletša mo go R&D gore go hlohleletšwe kgolo ya ekonomi, le go godiša katlego.
tgt_text: IKhabinethi igunyate kwetfulwa ePhalamende kweluHlelo lwekuhlomulisa intsela ye-R&D eminyakeni lemibili leyengcile (nga-2019/20 na-2020/21).

src_text: Kabinete thabela gore pego bontšha gore dikhamphani tše difsa di dirile kgopelo ya tlhohleletšo ya motšhelo hlohleletša dikhamphani tše dintši go hwetša setlamo se bjalo ka karolo ya go godiša dipeeletšo tša bona le go hlohleletša kgolo ya ekonomi.
tgt_text: Loku kuhambisana nesigaba 11D (17) seMtsetfo Wentsela Yemalingena, 1962 (uMtsetfo 58 1962), lodzinga kutsi lemibiko yetfulwe ePhalamende.

src_text: Dikhamphani tše nne tša godimo tšeo di hweditšego tlhohleletšo ya motšhelo di ka makaleng tshepetšo ya ditšweletšwa tša temo; kaonafatšo ya meepo; dikhemikhale, dibotsefatši, dihlare le elektrotheknikhale le Theknolotši ya Tshedimošo tšeo Kabinete di dumeletšego bjalo ka dikarolo tše bohlokwa mo Leanong la Katlego ya Pholisi ya Intasteri.
tgt_text: Loluhlelo lwekuhlomulisa intsela luhlose kugcugcutela tinkampani letitimele kutsi titjale ku-R&D kuze kugcugcuteleke kukhula kwelutjalomali.

src_text: Pego ka botlalo ka hwetšwa mo wepsaeteng ya Kgoro ya Saense le Kaonofatšo: www.dst.gov.za.
tgt_text: Kusita kuchubeka kwesayensi nekucamba lokutokhulisa umnotfo, kuchubekise nekuncintisana.

src_text: Foramo ya Molao wa Dibaka le Kgolo ya Afrika (AGOA) -.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi inetisekile kutsi lombiko ukhombisa kutsi tinkampani letinsha tifake ticelo tekuhlomuliswa ngentsela.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go swarwa ga Foramo ya AGOA ka.
tgt_text: Loku kugcugcutela letinye tinkampani kufikelela kulesikimu njengencenye lekhulisa lutjalomali igcugcutele kukhula kwemnotfo.

src_text: AGOA dumeletšwe ke Amerika (USA) ka 2000 go fa phihlelelo ya go ikgetha ya kgwebo ya go ikema go bontši bja dinaga tša Afrika tša Borwa bja Sahara le mebaraka ya gae ya USA.
tgt_text: Tinkampani letine letisetulu letifinyelele kulokuhlomula tikumkhakha wekusetjentwa kwemikhicito yetekulima; timayini, emakhemikhali, tekutimonyonga, temakhemisi nete-elekhtrothekhnikhali nemikhakha yethekhnoloji yelwatiso iKhabinethi lekubeke njengalokuphambili KuluHlelo lweNchubomgomo Yekusebenta kuTetimboni.

src_text: Dikišontle tša Afrika Borwa ka fase ga AGOA di akaretša dienywa tša go butšwa, dimake, dikoloi, didirišwa, tšhipi, setala le ditšweletšwa tša khemikhale.
tgt_text: Umbiko lophelele uyatfolakala kuwebhusayithi yeLitiko leSayensi nekuCamba letsi: www.dst.gov.za..  Iforamu yeMtsetfo Wekukhula Nematfuba E-Afrika (i-AGOA) –.

src_text: Tšatšikgwedi la nnete le lefelo di sa tlo tsebišwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kusingatfwa kweForamu ye-AGOA nga-.

src_text: Samiti ya Ditona ya Sehlopha sa Ditlhahlobo tša Lefase (GEO) –.
tgt_text: I-AGOA yagunyatwa yi-United States of America (USA) nga-2000 kuze kutsi inikete litfuba lekuhwebelana emaveni lamanyenti e-sub-Saharan Afrika kanye ne-USA.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše gore Afrika Borwa sware Samiti ya Ditona ya GEO ka Motsekapa ka.
tgt_text: Kweluhwebo lokutfunyelwako kwaseNingizimu Afrika ngaphansi kwe-AGOA kuhlanganisa titselo letidliwako, emantongomane, timoti, tincenye talokuhanjiswako, insimbi, lokuyinsimbi kanye nemikhicito yemakhemikhali.

src_text: GEO ke mokgatlo wa mebušo ya boditšhabatšhaba woo hlomilwego ka 2003 ka morago ga Samiti ya Lefase ya Tlhabollo ya go Swarelela šoma bjalo ka sefala sa kopano moo dinaga di kgathago tema ka go ithaopa go fihlelela nepo ya go swana ya go aga mananeo GEO.
tgt_text: Lilanga lelingulonalona nendzawo kusatomenyetelwa.

src_text: Gonabjale GEO na le mebušo ya bosetšhaba ya go feta 113, ye 30 ya yona tšwago ka Afrika gomme mekgatlo ye ka bago 140 kgatha tema, gomme ye 11 ya yona tšwa Afrika.
tgt_text: INgcungcutsela YaboNgcongcoshe ye-Group on Earth Observations (i-GEO).

src_text: Afrika Borwa dutše le leloko la Komitiphethiši go tloga ka 2005 gomme boramahlale ba rena gonabjale ba kgatha tema mananeong dinyakišišo mmalwa ao etilwego pele ke GEO.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kutsi iNingizimu Afrika isingatse Ingcungcutsela Yabongcongcoshe be-GEO eKapa nga-.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Dinamelwa ya Diphalane (OTM) –.
tgt_text: I-GEO iyinhlangano yabohulumende bemave leyasungulwa nga-2003 ngemuva kweNgcungcutsela Yemhlaba Yentfutfuko Lechubekako yanga-.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go thakgolwa ga lesolo la OTM ka Mokibelo, 1 Diphalane 2022, ka fase ga morero: “Sishov’ingolovane: mmogo re aga infrastraktšha ya dinamelwa yeo agago mešomo ya go swarelela”.
tgt_text: Isebenta njengenkhundla yetive ngetive lapho emave afaka khona sandla ngekutitsandzela emgomweni lofanako wekwakha tinchubo te-GEO.

src_text: OTM ya ngwaga le ngwaga šomišwa go godiša temošo ka dinamelwa bjalo ka dikarolo tše bohlokwa mo kgolong ya ekonomi le tlhabollo ya mahlakore mararo.
tgt_text: I-GEO kwanyalo inabohulumende bavelonkhe labangetulu kwema-113, labange-30 kubo babuya e-Afrika kanye netinhlangano letitibandzakanyako letingaba ngema-140, leti-11 tato tibuya e-Afrika.

src_text: Go tla ba le ditiragalo tše mmalwa go bontšha dikarolo tše mmalwa tša infrastraktšha ya dinamelwa ka go difofane, dikepe, dinamelwa tša bohle le ditsela.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika ibe lilunga lelisebentako leliKomidi Leliphetse kusukela nga-2005 futsi bososayensi betfu njengamanje batibandzakanya etinhlelweni letinyentana telucwaningo letiholwa yi-GEO.

src_text: Ditiragalo di lemoša gape ka polokego le tšhireletšo ya dinamelwa.
tgt_text: Imphala Inyanga Yetekutfutsa (i-OTM) –.

src_text: Go tla akaretšwa gape bakgathatema go boledišana ka ditlhohlo tša go fapana mo lekaleng la dinamelwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kwetfulwa kwemkhankhaso we-OTM ngeMgcibelo, mhla lu-1 Imphala 2022, ngaphansi kwendzikimba letsi: “Sishov’ingolovane: ndzawonye sakha sakhiwonchanti kutekutfutsa lesakha siphindze simamise timphilo”.

src_text: Mmušo dula ikgafile mo go kaonafatšeng infrastraktšha ya dinamelwa ya naga, bobedi mo mafelong segae le setoropong, gore go sepetšwe tshepelo ye botse gape ya bokgoni ya dithoto le batho.
tgt_text: I-OTM yeminyaka yonkhe isetjentiselwa kucaphelisa ngetekutfutsa njengalenye yetintfo letibalulekile ekukhuleni kwemnotfo kanye nekutfutfukiswa kwendzawo.

src_text: Kopano ya Lenaneo la Magae la Bodulo bja Batho (UN-HABITAT) la Kopanoditšhaba (UN).
tgt_text: Kutokwentiwa imisebenti leminyentana kukhombisa imikhakha leyehlukene yesakhiwonchanti setekutfutsa kutekundiza, taselwandle, tekutfutsa umphakatsi kanye nemigwaco.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go swarwa ga kopano ya maloko UN-HABITAT ka Johannesburg ka la 16 Diphalane..  Kgoro ya Bodulo bja Batho tla sepetša kopano ye ya matšatši mabedi yeo tla tsenelwago ke ditsebi tša dipolotiki, ditsebi le banyakišiši, go akaretša malokomagolo Komiti ya go ya go ile ya Baemedi ba UN-HABITAT bao ba lego Nairobi, Kenya.
tgt_text: Lemisebenti itophindze icaphelise mayelana netekuphepha netekuvikeleka kutekutfutsa.

src_text: Ditaba tše bohlokwa tšeo go tla bolelwago ka tšona di tla akaretša ditsenogare tša phetogo go badudi ba mekhukhung le metsesetoropo go tlala kudu.
tgt_text: Kutophindze kubanjwe tinkhulumiswano nalabatsintsekako kuze kucociswane ngetinsayeya letehlukene emkhakheni wetekutfutsa.

src_text: Dipoelo tša dipoledišano tše di tla phethwa mo thakgolong ya Tlhako ya Leano la Katlego la Lefase, yeo tla alwago Kopanong ya UN-HABITAT gore dumelelwe ka  Melaokakanywa.
tgt_text: Hulumende usatibophelele ekwenteni ncono sakhiwonchanti setekutfutsa selive, etindzaweni tasemaphandleni netasemadolobheni, kuze kube lula kutfutfwa kwetimphahla nebantfu ngendlela lesebentako nalenelisako.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wa Khansele ya Setšhaba ya Dikgaruru tša Bong le Dipolao tša Basadi le Bana (GBVF) wa.
tgt_text: Umhlangano Wenhlangano Yetive Letihlangene (UN) WeluHlelo Lekuhlaliswa Kwebantfu (UN-HABITAT).

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa ga Molaokakanywa wa Khansele ya Setšhaba ya 2021 Palamenteng gore go šoganwe le wona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kusingatfwa kwemhlangano wemalunga e-UN-HABITAT eJozi mhla ti-16 namhla ti-17 Imphala.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo fa tlhako ya molao mo go hlongweng ga mokgatlo wa molao gore go be le tsenogare ye nepišago mo go šoganeng le GBVF dumelela gape go thongwa ga Boto ya Khansele yeo tla fago taolo yeo beakantšwego gomme ya laola phethagatšo ya Leano la Taolo ya Setšhaba ka ga GBVF, leo le dumeletšwego ke Kabinete ka Diphalane 2020 go phethagatšwa.
Boto tla le kemedi ya 51 go tšwa go setšhaba sa gae le 49% go tšwa mmušong.
tgt_text: Litiko Letekuhlaliswa Kwebantfu litocondzanisa lomhlangano wemalanga lamabili lotohanjelwa tingcweti tetembusave, bongoti kanye nebacwaningi, lokufaka emalunga labalulekile eliKomidi Lebameleli Ngalokugcwele Be-UN-HABITAT lelitinte eNairobi, eKenya.

src_text: Molaokakanywa šetše swayaswayilwe ke setšhaba.
tgt_text: Tindzaba letibalulekile lokutocociswana ngato tifaka kufuna kungenelela kwetingucuko emikhukhwini kanye nasemijondolo.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wa Ditšweletšwa tša Motšoko le Didirišwa tša go Kgoga Motšoko tša Elektroniki wa.
tgt_text: Imiphumela yalokucocisana itoholela ekwetfulweni kweluHlaka Lwekusebenta Lwemhlaba Wonkhe, lolutokwetfulwa eMhlanganweni We-UN-HABITAT kuze kutsi lugunyatwe nga-  IMitsetfosivivinyo.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa palamenteng Ditshwayotshwayo tša Molaokakanywa wa Ditšweletšwa tša Motšoko le Didirišwa tša go Kgoga Motšoko tša Elektroniki wa 2018, tšeo di nyakago go phumola Molao wa gonabjale wa go Laola Ditšweletšwa tša Motšoko, (Molao wa 83 wa 1993) go ya le ka moo mpshafaditšwego ka gona.
tgt_text: UMtsetfosivivinyo weMkhandlu Wavelonkhe Wekuhlukunyetwa Ngekwebulili Nekubulawa Kwalabasikati (i-GBVF) wa-.

src_text: Molaokakanywa nyaka go matlafatša magato maphelo setšhaba naga gomme dire gore sepelelane le Tumelelano ya Tlhako ya Mokgatlo wa Maphelo Lefase ka ga Taolo ya Motšoko.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kwetfulwa ePhalamende kweMkhandlu Wavelonkhe WeMtsetfosivivinyo we-GBVF wa-2021 kuze ucutjungulwe.

src_text: Molaokakanywa šišinya gare ga tše dingwe, gore go se sa folelwa ka gare ga meago le mafelo mangwe ka ntle ga meago; go fedišwa ga thekišo ya sekerete mo metšheneng ya go rekiša, le go thekga taba ya diphuthelwana tša disekerete le maswao temošo.
tgt_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uniketa luhlaka lwemtsetfo kuze kusungulwe sigungu lesisemtsetfweni lesitoniketa kungenelela lokucondzene ngco nekubukana ne-GBVF.

src_text: Molaokakanywa fetišitšwe dikgatong tša go tsenelela tša go nyaka maikutlo setšhaba go fapana, go akaretša intasteri ya metšoko mekgatlo ya badudi le dikgoro tša mmušo tša maleba  Ditiragalo tše di Tlago.
tgt_text: Iphindze inikete kusungulwa kweBhodi yeMkhandlu letoniketa buholi lobunetindlelasu futsi wengamele kucaliswa kweluHlelo Lwendlelasu Yavelonkhe nge-GBVF, lolwavunywa yiKhabhinethi ngeMphala 2020 kutsi lucalwe.

src_text: Kopano ya bo 77 ya Kopanokakaretšo ya UN (UNGA77).
tgt_text: Lebhodi itoba nemalunga lama-51% etinhlanganweni temphakatsi kanye nema-49% lavela kuhulumende.

src_text: Afrika Borwa kgatha tema ka go UNGA77 yeo lego ka go dikantorokgolo tša UN ka Toropokgolong ya New York ka USA go tloga ka la 27 Lewedi 2022 ka fase ga morero: “Nako ya mathata: Go tšweletša ditharollo go kgokaganya ditlhohlo”.
tgt_text: UMtsetfosivivinyo sewundlulile ekubonisaneni nemphakatsi.

src_text: Go Borwa bja lefase, khuetšo ya ekonomi le ekonomi ya leago ya leuba la Bolwetši bja Coronavirus (COVID-19) bile bothata kudu malebana le tsošološo go Leboa leo le hlabologilego gomme se se nyaka maitapišo ao kopanetšwego go tšwa dinageng ka moka go kgonthiša gore ga go na yoo tlogetšwego morago.
tgt_text: UMtsetfosivivinyo wa-2018 wekuLawulwa kweMikhicito yeLigwayi kanye naSikilidi we-elekthronikhi.

src_text: Pele ga Ngangišano ya Kakaretšo ya UN, Mongwaledikakaretšo wa UN, Morena António Guterres tla beakanya samiti ka ga “Go fetoša Thuto” le go swara kopano ya maemo godimo yeo nepišago Dinepo tša Tlhabollo ya go Swarelela (di-SDG).
tgt_text: IKhabinethi igunyate kwetfulwa ePhalamende kweMtsetfosivivinyo wa-2018 wekuLawulwa kweMikhicito yeLigwayi kanye neSikilidi we-Elekthronikhi, lokuhloswe ngawo kucedza uMtsetfo lokhona manje Wekulawula Imikhicito yeLigwayi, wa-1993 (uMtsetfo 83 wa-1993), njengoba uchitjiyelwe.

src_text: Kopano ya di-SDG swanelwa ke go nyakišiša ditsela tšeo go ka tsošološago maatla le go potlakiša phethagatšo.
tgt_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uhlose nekucinisa tinyatselo telive tetemphilo yemphakatsi futsi ticondzaniswe neSivumelwane Seluhlaka Lwekulawula Ligwayi Senhlangano Yetemphilo Yemhlaba.

src_text: Letšatši la Bohwa.
tgt_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uhlongota, kulokunye, ema-100% ekungabhemeli endlini nakuletinye tindzawo letingaphandle; kuvinjelwa kwekutsengiswa kweligwayi ngemishini yekutsengisa, kanye nekucinisa kupakishwa kweligwayi kanye netimphawu letisicwayiso.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla fa polelokgolo mo meketekong ya Letšatši la Bohwa la Setšhaba mo Union Buildings ka Mokibelo, 24 Lewedi.
tgt_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo sewundlule ekubonisaneni lokubanti nalabatsintsekako labehlukene, lokufaka imboni yeligwayi, tinhlangano temiphakatsi kanye nematiko ahulumende lafanele  Imicimbi Letako.

src_text: Moletlo tla swarwa ka fase ga morero: “Go keteka Bohwa bja Solomon Linda le Mmino wa Setšo wa Afrika Borwa”.
tgt_text: ISeshini yema-77th yeMbutsano Lotayelekile we-UN.

src_text: Kgwedi ye ya Bohwa nepiša mmino wa setšo wa Afrika Borwa ka nepišo ya mmino wa Isicathamiya le tema yeo ikgathago go dipapadi, bokgabo, setšo le bohwa.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika itibandzakanye ku-UNGA77 letoba endlunkhulu ye-UN eDolobheni laseNew York e-USA kusukela mhla ka-20 kuya kumhla ka-27 INyoni 2022 ngaphansi kwendzikimba letsi: “Sikhatsi sekuhlukanisa: Kuvula ticatululo tengucuko tetinsayeya letitfungene”.

src_text: Morero hlompha matswalo bo 60 go hlokofala ga rammino, seopedi le motšweletši Solomon Popoli Linda (1901-1962), yoo tsebegago gape bjalo ka Solomon Ntsele, yoo tsebegago kudu bjalo ka motšweletši wa koša ya, “Mbube”.
tgt_text: Emaveni laseNingizimu, umtselela kutemnotfo nakutenhlalomnotfo wabhubhane we-Coronavirus (COVID-19) awukalingani nawucatsaniswa nekululama eNyakatfo letfutfukile futsi loku kudzinga umtamo lobumbene kuto tonkhe tive kuze kucinisekiswe kutsi akekho losalela emuva.

src_text: Moletlo wa go Lebana wa Letšatši la Dikepe la.
tgt_text: Andvulela Inkhulumomphikiswano Jikelele ye-UN, Nobhala-Jikelele we-UN, Mnu António Guterres, utobita ingcungcutsela lemayelana "Nengucuko Kutemfundvo" futsi abambe umhlangano losezingeni lelisetulu lobuke etiNhlosweni tekuTfutfukiswa Lokusimeme (ema-SDG).

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla be swara Moletlo wa go Lebana wa Letšatši la Dikepe la 2022 ka Durban go tloga ka la 14 Diphalane.
tgt_text: Umhlangano wema-SDGs kulindzeleke kutsi uhlole tindlela tekutfola umfutfo futsi usheshise kucaliswa kwato.

src_text: Moletlo tla swarwa nakong ya OTM, woo le wona tla bago karolo ya go godiša tsebo ya lekala la rena la dikepe.
tgt_text: Lilanga Lemagugu.

src_text: Moletlo tla tliša baemedi go tšwa dinageng tša go fapana bao ba tla itemogelang intasteri ya dikepe ya Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Mengameli Ramaphosa utokwetfula inkhulumo yelusuku emgubhweni weLilanga Lemagugu Lavelonkhe la-2022 e-Union Buildings ngeMgcibelo, mhlaka-24 INyoni.

src_text: Afrika Borwa bile leloko la Mokgatlo wa Dikepe wa Boditšhabatšhaba go tloga ka 1995, woo lego mokgatlo wa go ikgetha wa UN wa go laola dikepe.
tgt_text: Lomcimbi utobanjwa ngaphansi kwendzikimba letsi: “Kubungata Lifa LaSolomon Linda Nemculo Wemdzabu waseNingizimu Afrika”.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Boeti.
tgt_text: INyanga Yemagugu yalomnyaka icondzene ngco nemculo wesintfu waseNingizimu Afrika ikakhulukati emculweni wesicathamiya kanye neligalelo lawo lelikhulu kutemidlalo, tebuciko, emasiko nemagugu.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Boeti ngwaga wo ketekwa ka fase ga morero wa Letšatši la Boeti la Lefase (27 Lewedi) wa “Nagana gape ka Boeti”.
tgt_text: Indzikimba ihlonipha iminyaka lema-60 kwandlula emhlabeni umculi, Longumhlabeleli nemcambi wetingoma Solomon Popoli Linda (1909-1962), lowatiwa ngaSolomon Ntsele, nalowadvuma kakhulu njengemcambi wengoma letsi, “Mbube”.

src_text: Boeti bja gae bo bohlokwa kudu mo go tsošološeng lekala la boeti, leo le kgathago tema kudu go GDP ya Afrika Borwa le go hlola mošomo.
tgt_text: Umcimbi Wekulinganisa Welilanga Letaselwandle La-.

src_text: Kabinete thabišwa ke gore lekala la kamogelo ya baeti le begile kgolo ya baeti ka morago ga nako ya COVID-.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika itobe isingatse Umcimbi Wekulinganisa WeliLanga Letaselwandle Lemnyaka wa-2022 eThekwini kusukela mhla ka-12 kuya mhla ka-14 Imphala.

src_text: Go tšerwe maeto gae  2 milione mo seripeng sa mathomo sa 2022 begile koketšego ya 114% ge go bapetšwa le nako ya go swana ka.
tgt_text: Lomcimbi utosingatfwa ngesikhatsi se-OTM, nayo letoba yincenye yekucaphelisa ngemkhakha wetfu wetaselwandle.

src_text: Se se bontšha kaonafalo ya mmaraka ya nako ya go swana ka 2019, yeo bonego maeto ao tšerwego gae  6 milione.
tgt_text: Lomcimbi utoletsa titfunywa letivela emaveni lahlukene letitotibonela imboni yetaselwandle yaseNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Bjalo ka karolo ya go keteka Kgwedi ya Boeti, Kabinete hlohleletša maAfrika Borwa go tšea maeto ‘Shortleft’ go ya diprofense tša rena tša go fapana.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika ibe lilunga leNhlangano Yetaselwandle Yemave Ngemave kusukela nga-1995, lokusikhungo lesikhetsekile se-UN lesibukene nekulawula imikhumbi.

src_text: Kabinete amogela gape sephetho sa Air Belgium go fofiša difofane tša sehla go ya Afrika Borwa, go thoma kgwedi yona ye (Lewedi), seo se tla matlafatšago boeti gomme sa tiišetša maemo rena bjalo ka nepo ya boeti ya kgetho.
tgt_text: Inyanga Yetekuvakasha.

src_text: Se tla akaretša difofane tša beke ye nngwe le ye nngwe go ya Motsekapa le Johannesburg  Melaetša.
tgt_text: INyanga Yetekuvakasha kulomnyaka igujwa ngaphansi kwendzikimba yeLilanga Lemhlaba Letekuvakasha (27 INyoni) lelitsi “Kucabanga Kuvakasha Futsi”.

src_text: DitebogišoKabinete lebogiša le go lakaletša tše dibotse go:Mopresidente William Samoei Ruto wa Repabliki ya Kenya, yoo hlomamišitšwego ka Labobedi, 13 Lewedi 2022, go latela dikgetho tša bosetšhaba tša khutšo tšeo di swerwego ka la 9 Phato.
tgt_text: Tekuvakasha tasekhaya tibalulekile ekuvuseleleni umkhakha wetekuvakasha, loneligalelo lelikhulu kuGDP yaseNingizimu Afrika nasekudaleni imisebenti.

src_text: Motlatšamopresidente David Mabuza tsenetše tlhomamišo legatong la Mopresidente Ramaphosa, le mmušo le batho ba Repabliki ya Afrika Borwa.South African Rugby Union le Toropokgolo ya Motsekapa go swara phadišano ya bo seswai ya Rugby World Cup Sevens gare ga 9 le 11 Lewedi be le lekga la mathomo tiragalo ye ye bohlokwa swarwa ke naga ya Afrika gomme barati ba diketekete bao ba tsenetšego ba ilwe ba thabišwa ka dijo tša rugby le kamogelo ye lemogwago ya Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikujabulele kutsi umkhakha wetekunakekela kutekuvakasha urekhode kwenyuka kwetivakashi ngemuva kwesikhatsi seCovid-.

src_text: MahlokoKabinete romela melaetša ya mahloko go malapa le bagwera ba:Bana ba sekolo ba 18 le batho ba bagolo ba babedi bao ba hlokofetšego mo kotsing ye šoro ka Pongola, KwaZulu-Natal ka Labohlano, 16 Lewedi 2022 ka morago ga go thulana ga lori le bene yeo bego nameditše bana ba sekolo  Bao ba Thwetšwego Mešomong.
tgt_text: Bantfu labatigidzile-.

src_text: Batho ka moka bao ba thwetšwego mešomong mangwalo bona dithuto tla tiišetšwa le go netefatšwa ka maleba  Morena Makgothi Samuel Thobakgale bjalo ka Molaodimogolophethiši (DG): Mokhomišinare wa Setšhaba wa Kgoro ya Ditirelo tša Tshokollo  Ngaka Malixole Percival Mahlati bjalo ka Motlatšamolaodimogolophethiši (DDG: lefapheng la go šoma ka merero ya Dikolo tša Maokelo tša Thuto ya Godimo ka moka le ya Tlhabollo ya Bašomi mo Kgorong ya Maphelo  Morena Siyabonga Blessing Mdubeki bjalo ka Mohlahlobimogolophethiši mo Kgorong ya Temo, Tsošološo ya Naga le Tlhabollo ya Dinagamagaed.
tgt_text: 2  batsatfwe luhambo ngesigamu sekucala sa-2022, loku kusho kutsi sibalo setivakashisikhuphuke ngema-114% nakucatsaniswa nesikhatsi lesifanako sa-.

src_text: Morena Phaswa Phineas Mamogale bjalo ka Mohlankedimogolo wa Ditšhelete mo Kgorong ya Maphelo.
tgt_text: Loku kukhombisa kukhuphuka lokubonakalako kwesikhatsi lesifanako sa-2019, lapho bantfu labatigidzi letingema-.

src_text: Tšhireletšego ya Meetse.
tgt_text: Kutfolakala kwemanti.

src_text: Kabinete lebogile MaAfrika Borwa ka moka ge ba obametše taelo ya go fokotšwa ga meetse ye phethagaditšwego dikarolong tše dingwe tša Johannesburg, Tshwane le Ekurhuleni go boetša sekeng maemo matamo.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ibonge bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika ngekutfobela imibandzela yemanti lesetjentiswe etindzaweni letitsite taseJozi, taseTshwane netase-Ekurhuleni kute kusimamiswe linani lemanti lasemadamini.

src_text: Matamo ka mehutahuta ka fase ga kgatelelo ye kgolo kudu ka baka la dithemphereitšha tša go fiša tšhiritšhiri gola Gauteng, ebile nyakego ye golelago godimo ya meetse gapeleditše Rand Water go fokotša ka bontši meetse ao abelwago mebasepala.
tgt_text: Emadamu netilulu temanti tisaloku ticindzetelekile ngenca yemazinga ekushisa lasetulu eGauteng, futsi kukhula kwesidzingo semanti kuphocelele i-Rand Water kutsi inciphise kakhulu kuphakelwa kwemanti kubomasipala.

src_text: Rand Water aba meetse go nwega mantši bathong ba go feta 11 milione go la Gauteng, dikarolong tše dingwe tša Mpumalanga, Freistata le Leboa Bodikela.
tgt_text: Lesikhungo lesilusito sekuphakela emanti siphakela emanti ekunatsa ngebunyenti ebantfwini labangetulu kwetigidzi leti-11 eGauteng, etincenyeni letitsite teMpumalanga, eFreyistata naseNyakatfo Nshonalanga.

src_text: Tšona diphokotšo tše tša go se efogege di nepile go boloka kabo ya meetse ebile di tla dula di le gona go ba go fihlela ge seemo se kaonafala.
tgt_text: Lemibandzela lengavimbeleki ihlose kuvikela kutfolakala kwemanti futsi itawuhlala ikhona site simo sibe ncono.

src_text: Kabinete dirile boipiletšo setšhabeng go tšwelapele go obamela magato phokotšo ya meetse le go kgatha tema ya bona ka go šomiša ka tshwanelo ka ge le sedirišwa sa go hlokwa kudu.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi icela ummango kutsi uchubeke nekutfobela lemibandzela yemanti nekutsi udlale indzima yekutsi usebentise lensita leyimvela kancane ngendlela leyongako.

src_text: Mogwanto wa Transnet.
tgt_text: Siteleka sase-Transnet.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše kwano ya meputso ya mengwaga ye meraro ye kwanetšwego ke Transnet le Yunione ya Mohlakanelwa ya Bosetšhaba ya Dinamelwa (UNTU), ye tlo dirišwago pakeng ya 1 Moranang 2022 go fihla ka la 31 Hlakola.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyasamukela lesivumelwano semiholo seminyaka lemitsatfu lesisemkhatsini kwe-Transnet nenyonyane yebasebenti i-United National Transport Union (i-UNTU), lesitawusebenta kusuka mhla lu-1 Mabasa 2022 kuya kumhla tinge-31 Indlovulenkhulu.

src_text: Khomišene ya Poelano, Bonamodi le Ditherišano namotše kwano ye, gomme magato bona dirile gore boipelaetšo ka maloko UNTU bo fedišwe ka ponyo ya leihlo.
tgt_text: Ikhomishini Yekubuyisana, Yekungenelela Neyekulamula beyengamele lomhlangano lote nalesivumelwano, locedze lesiteleka samanje semalunga e-UNTU ngaleso sikhatsi.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše gape sephetho sa go fediša mogwanto ka Yunione ya Dinamelwa ya Afrika Borwa le ya Bašomi.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iphindze yasemukela sincumo se-South African Transport and Allied Workers (i-SATAWU) sekucedza lesiteleka.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše boikgafo bja Transnet bja go bea šedi godimo ga go fediša ditšhalelomorago tše bilego gona go ralala boemakepe le dipeakanyong tša ditimela nakong ya magato boipelaetšo, ao bilego le seabe se se mpe ikonoming le makaleng ao tshepetšego godimo ga Transnet go aba ditirelo..   Kabinete bontšhitše tebogo ya yona godimo ga thekgo le tšhomišanommogo ye laeditšwego ke dikgwebo ka nako ya mogwanto hlohleletša kamano ye sa felego magareng ga balaodi ba Transnet le bašomi gore khamphani ye le ikonomi ya naga ka bophara di holege.
Dikamano tša Afrika Borwa le Saudi Arabia.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyakwamukela lokutibophelela kwe-Transnet ekutseni itawugcila kakhulu ekususeni kusilela emuva lokwenteke kuto tonkhe tikhumulo temikhumbi nasemizileni yetitimela ngalesikhatsi salesiteleka, lokube nemtselela lomubi kutemnotfo nakumikhakha lencike kulemisebenti.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše Ketelo ya Mošomo ye atlegilego ya go ya kua the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia ka Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ka la 15 le 16 Diphalane.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ibonge kakhulu lokwesekelwa nekubambisana lokuniketwe betemabhizinisi ngalesikhatsi salesiteleka.

src_text: Nakong ya keteko ye, dinaga tše ka bobedi di saenetše Dimemorantamo tše 17 tša Kwešišano go magoro go fapafapana go swana le temo, boreatlhapi, meepo, enetši ya go mpšhafatšega, tšhireletšego, dinamelwa le temo ya diphedi le dimela tša ka meetseng.
tgt_text: Igcugcutela kutsi buchubeke lobudlelwane lobusemkhatsini kwebaphatsi nebasebenti base-Transnet kute lenkampani netemnotfo tikhone kuzuza.

src_text: Dimemorantamo tše dingwe tša kwešišano tšeo di saenetšwego ke tša mabapi le go hlongwa ga Khansele ya Mohlakanelwa ya Dikgwebo, tšhomišano legorong la diintasteri tša sešole le dithekišetšano, tšhomišano ya ditekolonyakišišo tša thutaswika.
tgt_text: Budlelwane emkhatsini kweNingizimu Afrika neSaudi Arabia.

src_text: Mopresidente šomišitše ketelo ye go mema dikgwebo tša Saudi Arabia go iponagatša khonferenseng ya bohlano ya dipeeletšo ya Afrika Borwa ye tlo swarwago ka.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyakwemukela kuhamba kwaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa lokube yimphumelelo Ayovakashela Ngekwemsebenti Bukhosi baseSaudi Arabia mhla ti-15 namhla ti-16 Imphala.

src_text: Saudi Arabia ke mogwebišani wa bobedi wo mogologolo wa Afrika Borwa seleteng sa Bohlabelagare ebile ke mothopo wo mogologolo wa diromelwa ka nageng go tšwa go sona selete se.
tgt_text: Kulokuvakasha, lamave lamabili asayine tivumelwano tekusebentisana (ema-MoU) leti-17 kumikhakha lehlukahlukene lefana netekulima, tekudvweba, tetimbiwa, temandla lavikela simondzawo, tekuvikela, tekutfutsa netekulima ngetitjalo nangetilwane tasemantini.

src_text: Dikamano tša boditšhabatšhaba magareng ga dinaga tše ka bobedi di bile le ditlamorago tše botse godimo ga ditlwaedi tša kgwebišano le dipeeletšo.
tgt_text: Letinye tivumelwano letisayiniwe timayelana nekusungula Umkhandlu Wetemabhizinisi Lohlangene, kusebentisana kumkhakha wetetimboni tetetimphi netekutsengiselana, kanye nekusebentisana kutesayensi lemayelana nekuhlola ematje nemhlaba.

src_text: Dipeeletšo tša Mananeokgoparara.
tgt_text: Mengameli usebentise lokuvakasha kumema bosomabhizinisi baseSaudi Arabia kutsi bete eNingizimu Afrika kulenkhomfa yesihlanu Yekutjala timali letawubanjwa ngemnyaka we-.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše go thongwa ga polante ya tšweletšo ya plastiki ya maemo godimodimo lefaseng ka khampani ya go dira plastiki yeo tšwago pele maemong boditšhabatšhaba, ya go bitšwa ALPLA Group, go la Lanseria kua Gauteng.
tgt_text: I-Saudi Arabia ingumlingani weNingizimu Afrika wesibili ngebukhulu kutekuhwebelana kulesigodzi saseMphumalanga Lemaphakatsi futsi ihamba embili ekutsengeni tintfo letibuya kulesigodzi.

src_text: Se se tlaleletša maikgafo Mopresidente Ramaphosa go bea sekeng tlhabollo ya mananeokgoparara bjalo ka mokgwa wa go hlohleletša kgolo ya ikonomi le go atiša mešomo..   Dipeeletšo tša boleng bja US$50 milione di kgatha tema ye kgolo godimo ga Leanolegolo la Toropo ya Mabonwa ya Lanseria leo le tlo hlohleletšago seemo seo se tieletšego le tšhomišoleswa le gape go hlola le go šireletša mešomo ye.
tgt_text: Budlelwane betemave emhlaba emkhatsini walamave lamabili bente kutsi kube nemtselela lomuhle kutekuhwebelana netelutjalomali..   Kutjala Timali Kusakhiwonchanti.

src_text: Godimo ga dipeeletšo tše go akaretšwa le lenaneo la go ithutela mošomo la batsebi ba 36 ba bointšineere bja dikgerekgere le ba tšhomišogape ba ditiro tša ALPLA Group go ralala selete sa Borwa bja Afrika.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi kusungulwe imboni lesezingeni lemhlaba lekhicita iplasitiki lekutawentiwa yimboni lehamba embili emhlabeni, i-ALPLA Group, eLanseria eGauteng.

src_text: Lenaneo le la boithutelamošomo le tlo thoma ka 2023, ka baithutelamošomo ba mathomo ba 12 ba MaAfrika Borwa ba go tšwa mafelong ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: Loku kucinisa kutibophelela kwaMengameli Ramaphosa ekubekeni kutfutfukisa sakhiwonchanti njengendlela yekuvuselela kukhulisa umnotfo neyekukhulisa ematfuba emisebenti..   Lolutjalomali lolubita imali letigidzi leti-50 temadola aseMelika lufaka ligalelo lelimcoka kuloluhlelo lolukhulu lwekwakhiwa kwelidolobha i-Lanseria Smart City lolutawuhambisa embili kusimama kwenta imikhicito lemisha ngetintfo lesetilahliwe kanye nekwakha kuphindze futsi kusekelwe ematfuba emisebenti lenge-.

src_text: Meepo ye Sego Molaong.
tgt_text: Lokunye lokutawuba khona luhlelo lwekucecesha bafundzi labange-36 babe bonjiniyela bemishini yebucwepheshe nekuba bocwepheshe bekwenta imikhicito lemisha ngetintfo lesetilahliwe be-ALPLA Group leyenta umsebenti kuso sonkhe sigodzi lesingaseningizimu kwe-Afrika.

src_text: Meepo ye sego molaong kweša setšhaba bohloko le go gobatša ikonomi ya gaborena, ebile dipoelo tša yona ke tobo ya letseno go bobedi mmušo le lefapha la meepo..   Kabinete amogetše go amogwa ga dithunya tšeo di bego di utilwe le go golegwa ga bagononelwa ba 20 ba go amana le meepo ye sego molaong ka nako ya lesolophuruphutšo kua mokoting wa moepo wa Stilfontein go la Leboa Bodikela.
tgt_text: Loluhlelo lwekuceceshwa ufundza lutawucala ngemnyaka we-2023, lapho khona bafundzi labatawucala kuceceshwa laba-12 baseNingizimu Afrika batawutsatfwa emimangweni yakuleyondzawo.

src_text: Kabinete dira boipiletšo go MaAfrika Borwa go tšwelapele go šomišana le mabotho phethagatšo ya molao go netefatša go atlega ga masolo kamoso twantšho ya bosenyi.
tgt_text: Kumbiwa kwetimbiwa lokungekho emtsetfweni.

src_text: Se se tla romela molaetša wo bogale wa gore bosenyi ga bo thuše ka selo, le gore badirabosenyi ba tlo golegwa le go sekišwa ntle poifo goba go šokelwa..  Enetši.
tgt_text: Kumbiwa kwetimbiwa lokungekho emtsetfweni kulimata imimango netemnotfo, futsi kubanga kutsi kulahleke imalingena kuhulumende nakumkhakha wetetimayini.

src_text: Eskom saenetše dikwanelo tša go hiriša tša mengwaga ye 30 gotee le babeeletši ba bane ba batšweletši ba go ikema ba mohlagase go aga metšhene ye mefsa ya go fehla enetši ya go hlweka kua ditišing tša mohlagase tša Majuba le Tutuka gola Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyakwamukela lokutfolakala kwetibhamu letinengi letingekho emtsetfweni nekuboshwa kwebasolwa labange-20 labatsintsekako kulokumbiwa kwetimbiwa letingekho emtsetfweni ngalesikhatsi kwentiwa luphenyo eStilfontein eNyakatfo Nshonalanga.

src_text: Khirišo ye ya seripa sa naga tla goketša dipeeletšo tše phopholeditšwego tša go batamela R40 bilione.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi icela bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika kutsi bachubeke basebentisane nema-ejensi etemtsetfo kucinisekisa kutsi kuba nemphumelelo emisebentini yekulwa nebugebengu esikhatsini lesitako.

src_text: Babeeletši ba ba bane – HDF Energy South Africa, Red Rocket SA, Solar Group le Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – ba tlo fehla mohlagase wa go lekana dimekawate tše 2 000 godimo ga mohlagase wa go tšweletšwa setšhabeng.
tgt_text: Loku kutawutfumela umlayeto lonemandla wekutsi bugebengu abukhokheli, nekutsi tigebengu titawubanjwa bese tiyashushiswa ngaphandle kwekusaba noma kwekuvuna luhlangotsi.

src_text: Phehlo ye ye mpsha ya mohlagase go letetšwe gore kgokaganywe le mohlagase wo tšweletšwago nageng ka bophara mo dikgweding tše 24 go fihla go tše 36 go tloga ge ngwaga wo wa ditšhelete fela, ka go latela ditumelelo tša tikologo, tša karolo ya mafelo le tše dingwe tša taolo.
tgt_text: Temandla.

src_text: Tšhireletšego ya Dijo.
tgt_text: I-Eskom isandza kusayina tivumelwano tekucashisa teminyaka lenge-30 nebatjali timali labakhicita gezi labatimele labane kute bakhe umkhicito wemtsamo lomusha wetemandla langabulali simondzawo etiteshini iMajuba neTutuka eMpumalanga.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše go swarwa ka mo nageng ga Lekgotla la 2022 la Agri SA go la Pretoria ka la 13 le la 14 Diphalane 2022 ka fase ga morero wo: “Kgodišo ya Tšweletšo ya ka Nageng”.
tgt_text: Lokucashiswa kwalomhlaba kutawuheha lutjalomali lolulinganiselwa kutigidzigidzi letinge-R..   Labatjalimali labane –i-HDF Energy South Africa, i-Red Rocket SA, i-Sola Group ne-Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – batawungeta lokungenani ema-megawatts la-2000 kulegridi yagezi wavelonkhe..   Lomkhicito wemtsamo lomusha kulindzeleke kutsi uchunywe kugridi yavelonkhe esikhatsini lesisemkhatsini kwetinyanga letinge-24 kuya kuletinge-36 kusuka ngembi kwekuvalwa kwetetimali, lokutawuya ngekugunyatwa ngumtsetfo wetesimondzawo, wekuhlelwa kwemhlaba kanye nangalokunye kuvumeleka kwemitsetfo..   Kutfolakala kwekudla.

src_text: Lekgotla le le rerišane ka merero ya go swana le go dira gore maanakgolo temo šomele batšweletši ba ka mo nageng; mananeokgoparara go swarelela dijo tša go tšweletšwa ka mo nageng; go dira gore tikologo ya ka mo nageng tšee nako ye telele godimo ga tšweletšo ya dijo ya ka mo nageng le ka bokamosong, le go matlafatša mabokgoni tšweletšo ya dijo go diriša ditšweletšo tšeo di tšweleditšwego ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyakwamukela kungenisa Ingcungcutsela ye-Agri SA yemnyaka we-2022 ePitoli mhla ti-14 Imphala 2022 ngaphasi kwalesihloko lesitsi: “Kulima Eveni Lakitsi”.

src_text: Ka gona go bea pele tšhireletšego ya dijo kamoso, Kabinete amogetše go tsebagatšwa ga Hapo ya Bosetšhaba ya Tšhireletšego ya Tlhago, ka Kgoro ya Saense le Lenaneo la Kgwebišano ya Temo ya Ikonomi ya Diphedi, ka tšhomišano le Yunibesithi ya Pretoria.
tgt_text: LeNgcungcutsela yacocisana mayelana netintfo letifana nekwenta kutsi luhlelo lolukhulu lwetekulima lusebentele balimi bakuleli; sakhiwonchanti lesisimeme nekudla lokulinywa kulendzawo; kwenta simondzawo sakuleli sikhone kumelana nekukhicita kudla kwalapha kuleli esikhatsini lesitako; nekukhulisa emandla ebalimi bakuleli kute bakhone kwenta imikhicito yetintfo letilinywa lapha kuleli lakitsi.

src_text: Hapo ye tla thekga thibelo, phokotšo le taolo ya dipuno le malwetši diphoofolo, ao tlo bago le seabe sa tšweletšo ye hlatlogetšego godimo, tšhireletšego ya dijo le tlhabollo ye swarelelago ya dinagamagae   Diphetho tša Kabinete.
tgt_text: Kuchubeka nekubeka embili kutfolakala kwekudla, Ikhabhinethi futsi iyakwemukela kwetfulwa kwesikhungo savelonkhe lesivimbela magciwane labanga tifo letitsatselanako i-National Biosecurity Hub, ngaphasi kweluhlelo lwe-Agricultural Bio-economy Innovation Partnership Programme, lokwentiwe Litiko Letesayensi Nekucamba kanye Neluhlelo Lwekusebentisana, libambisene neYunivesithi yasePitoli.

src_text: Go Dumelelwa ga Tšhatha ya Kopano ya Afrika (AU) ya go Hlongwa ga Makala.
tgt_text: Lesikhungo sitawusekela kuvikela, kunciphisa nekulawula tifo tetitjalo netetilwane, letitawuba neligalelo ekukhuliseni kukhicitwa kwekudla, ekutfolakaleni kwekudla kanye nentfutfuko lesimeme yetindzawo tasemaphandleni   Tincumo TeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo Palamenteng ga Tšhatha ya AU ka Mehola le Metheo ya go Hlongwa ga Makala, Pušoselegae le Tlhabollo ya ka Nageng gore dumelelwe.
tgt_text: Kusayinwa Kwemculu Wekusabalalisa Lubumbano Lwemave Ase-Afrika (i-AU).

src_text: Afrika Borwa saenetše tšhatha ye ka Phato.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kwetfulwa ePhalamnde kweMculu we-AU lomayelana Nekutiphatsa Netimiso Tekusabalalisa, Kuphatfwa Kwendzawo Yasekhaya Nekutfutfukiswa Kwayo Kute Ucinisekiswe.
INingizimu Afrika isayine lomculu ngenyanga yeNgci.

src_text: Tšhatha ye ya go Hlongwa ga Makala fana ka tlhako go mebušo ka moka ye lego maloko ka sengwalwa sa tlhahlo ka khuetšo ya go hlongwa ga makala le mehola ya ona go tloga mmušong wa bosetšhaba go ya didikong tše dingwe tša mmušo.
Tšhatha ye swaragane kudu le phatlalatšo ya taolo le mehola, tlhako ya pušo le tlhabollo ya ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: Umculu Wekusabalalisa unika onkhe emave langemalunga inchubomgomo leyinkhombandlela lemayelana nekusabalalisa emandla nemisebenti kusukela kuhulumende wavelonkhe kuya kuletinye tinhlaka tahulumende.

src_text: Khansele ya bo-32 ya Ngwaga ka Ngwaga ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Polokego ya Ditimela (IRSC).
tgt_text: Lomculu ukhuluma kakhulu ngekusabalalisa emandla ekuphatsa nemisebenti, ngenchubomgomo lemayelana nekuphatsa bohulumende basekhaya kanye nangekutfutfukisa indzawo yasekhaya..   Umkhandlu Wemave Emhlaba Wetekuphepha Kutetitimela Wemnyaka we-32 (i-IRSC).

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go swarwa ga Kopano ya bo-32 ya Ngwaga ka Ngwaga ya IRSC gola Johannesburg go thoma ka la 1 go fihla ka la 6 Diphalane 2023 ka fase ga morero wo: “Phetošo ya sebopego sa ditimela mo Lefaseng leo go sa tsebjego tša kamoso”.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi ubanjelwe kuleli umhlangano Wemnyaka We-IRSC eJozi kusuka mhla lu-1 kuya kumhla ti-6 Imphala 2023 ngaphasi kwalesihloko lesitsi: “Kubumba kabusha tetitimela kuloMhlaba lote siciniseko.”.

src_text: IRSC ke foramo ya boditšhabatšhaba ya go kopantšha mmogo ditsebi tša polokego ya ditimela go tšwa lefaseng ka bophara go fana maitemogelo go kaonafatša polokego ya ditimela..   Bjalo ka leloko la IRSC, Kemedi ya Afrika Borwa ya Polokego ya Ditimela swere foramo ye la mafelelo ka.
tgt_text: I-IRSC iyinkhundla yemave emhlaba lehlanganisa bocwepheshe betekuphepha kutetitimela labavela kuwo onkhe emave emhlaba kute babelane ngelwati kute kutfutfukiswe tekuphepha kutetitimela..   Njengelilunga le-IRSC, Umlawuli WaseNingizimu Afrika Wetekuphepha Kutetitimela lomcimbi wagcina kusingatsa lenkhundla kuleli ngemnyaka we-.

src_text: Seakanywa sa Leano la Bosetšhaba sa Mananeokgoparara 2050 (NIP 2050) Kgato ya.
Kabinete dumeletše phatlalatšo kuranteng ya mmušo ya Kgato ya Bobedi ya seakanywa sa NIP sa 2050 gore setšhaba se fe ditshwayotshwayo tša sona.
tgt_text: Luhlaka Lweluhlelo Lwesakhiwonchanti Savelonkhe leti-2050 (i-NIP 2050) Sigaba se-.

src_text: Leano le le fa tlhahlo matlafatšong le kaonafatšong ya diprotšeke tše logetšwego maano tša mmušo tša mohlakanelwa..   Seakanywa se se hlaola diprotšeke tše logetšwego maano madulong batho; mohlagase wa mmasepala; meetse; dilahlwa tše thata; dinamelwa tša banamedi; thuto le mananeokgoparara maphelo; mananeokgoparara titšithale, le bosenyi le bomenetša.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi yavuma kutsi kushicilelwe kumiculu yahulumende luhlaka lwe-NIP 2050 yeSigaba-2 kute kucociswane ngalo nemmango.

src_text: Sebopego sa leano le se fana ka ponelopele ya fao go swanetšego go fiwa šedi, se fana ka phetleko ya seemo sa bjale, se hlatholla dipeelano tše bohlokwa tša go atlega le go bolela gore go swanetše gore go dirwe eng go fihlelela ponelopele ye.
tgt_text: Loluhlelo lunika sicondziso sekukhulisa nesekungeta imiklamo lehlanganisiwe yendlelalisu lahulumende..   Loluhlaka libuka lemiklamo yendlelalisu nemigomo kutekuhlaliswa kwebantfu; kugezi wamasipala; kutemanti; kunkhukhuma; kutigitjelwa temmango; kutemfundvo; nakusakhiwonchanti setemphilo, kusakhiwonchanti lesidijithali, nakubugebengu nenkhohlakalo..     Indlela loluhlelo lwakheke ngayo inika umbono lomayelana nendzawo lekufuneka isetjentwe, iniketa luhlolo lwesimo samanje, ichaza timo letimcoka lekufuneka tiphumelele futsi iyasho kutsi yini lekufuneka yenteke kute kupheleliswe lombono.

src_text: Se šišinya tshepedišo ya phethagatšo ye swanetšego go latelwa mo leanong la magato la go gagaba tekano ya mengwaga ye meraro.
tgt_text: Ihlongota inchubo yekuphumelelisa lekufuneka itsatfwe kulomjikeleto weluhlelo lwekusebenta lweminyaka lemitsatfu..   Luhlaka Lwavelonkhe Lwekufezekisa Kwenta Temisebenti Yahulumende Ibe Yebucwephesha .

src_text: Tlhako ya Phethagatšo ya Bosetšhaba ya go Fihlelela Bokgoni Ditirelong tša Mmušo.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ilivumile loLuhlaka Lwavelonkhe Lwekufezekisa Kwenta Temisebenti Yahulumende Ibe Yetebuchwephesha.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše Tlhako ya Phethagatšo ya Bosetšhaba ya go fihlelela Bokgoni Ditirelong tša Mmušo.
tgt_text: Loluhlakamsebenti lwashicilelwa kute kucociswane ngalo nemmango ngemnyaka we-.

src_text: Tlhako ye phatlaladitšwe ka 2021 gore setšhaba se ntšhe sa mafahleng sona..   Tlhako ye fana ka maikokotlelo mahlano mo magatong go hloma bokgoni Ditirelong tša Mmušo.

Metheo ye ya boikokotlelo akaretša kgoketšo ya pele tsena le tlhokolo mo Ditirelong tša Mmušo; kgakolo le tlwaetšo; thulaganyo le taolo ya bodiragatši; thuto ye tšwelagopele, kgatelopele ya kgetho ya mošomo le ditiragalo tša mabapi le kgetho ya mošomo.
tgt_text: Loluhlakamsebenti luniketa imigomo lenetinsika letisihlanu letimayelana nekungenelela kute kwentiwe Temisebenti Yahulumende Ibe Yetebucwephesha.

src_text: Diphetogo ka Gare ga Dipeelano tša Mošomo tša Balaodipharephare (di-DG).
tgt_text: Letinsika tifaka ekhatsi loko lekufuneka kwentiwe ngembi kwekucashwa nekukhetfwa kuTemisebenti Yahulumende; kuchazelwa ngemsebenti nekungeniswa kahle kancane kancane kute ube yincenye yebasebenti ngalokuphelele; kuhlela nendlela yekulawula kwenta umsebenti kwaloyo naloyo muntfu; kuchubeka nekufundza nekutfutfukiswa lokusezingeni lebucwepheshe, kanye nekukhula kulomsebenti lowentako kanye netigameko temsebenti..   Tingucuko Kutimo Tekucashwa Kwebacondzisi Jikelele (ba-DG).

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše pego ya go šišinya magato go matlafatša mabokgoni le bokgoni bja Balaodipharephare (di-DG) Ditirelong tša Mmušo.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iwuvumile umbiko lohlongota kutsi kube netindlela tekukhulisa emandla nemakhono abo-DG kuTemisebenti Yahulumende.

src_text: Pego ye dirile ditšhišinyo tše mmalwa, go akaretšwa le paka ya ka kantorong ya di-DG le taolo ya baromiwa ka Lekgotlaphethiši go bahlankedi ba taolo..   Pego ye šišintše gape le gore Molaodipharephare Kantorong ya Mopresidente tla neelwa Hlogo ya Ditirelo tša Mmušo.
tgt_text: Lombiko ute netiphakamiso letimbalwa, letifaka ekhatsi sikhatsi sabo-DG sekuhlala kulowo msebenti kanye nekulawula ligunya lebalinikwe Sigungu Lesiphetse liye kulabo lababukene wekuphendvula..   Lombiko futsi uhlongote kutsi DG weLihhovisi laMengameli anikwe emandla ekuba Yinhloko Yetemisebenti Yahulumende.

src_text: Kua diprofenseng, mošomo wo tla neelwa Balaodipharephare dikantorong tša Ditonakgolo.
tgt_text: Etifundzeni, lomsebenti utawentiwa bo-DG labasemahhovisini aboNdvunankhulu.

src_text: Pego ye šišintše gape le magato go hlahla dikgoro ka taolo ya dikontraka le Balaodipharephare.
tgt_text: Lombiko futsi uhlongote tindlela letitawulandzelwa matiko ekulawuleni emakhontileka abo-DG.

src_text: Peakanyo ye Fetlekilwego ya Taolo ya Bodiragatši go Balaodipharephare gare ya fetlekwa gore gate ka mošito tee le diphetogo tšeo di dumeletšwego.

Tona ya Motšwaoswere ya Ditirelo tša Mmušo le Tsamaišo, Ntate Thulas Nxesi tlare mo bekeng ye tlago sware kopano ya tshedimošetšo ya babegaditaba go hlatholla Tlhako ya Bosetšhaba ya Phethagatšo go fihlelela Bokgoni Ditirelong tša Mmušo le gape go hlatholla gabotse diphetogo tše dumeletšwego dipeelanong tša go thwalwa ga Balaodipharephare.
tgt_text: Luhlelo Lolubuyeketiwe Lwekulawula Kusebenta Kwabo-DG lusabuyeketwa kute lucondzaniswe naletingucuko lekuvunyelwene ngato..   Indvuna Lebambile Yetemisebenti Yahulumende Netekuphatsa, Umnu.

src_text: Pego ya Bohlano ya Mošomo ka Phethagatšo ya Sengwalwa sa Makgoraditsela ka Ditokelo tša Batho ba go Phela ka Bogole (WPRPD) 2020-.
tgt_text: Thulas Nxesi, utawubamba umhlangano webetindzaba kuleliviki lelitako kute achaze ngaLenchubomgomo Yavelonkhe Yekwenta Umsebenti letawenta kube neBucwephesha Kutemisebenti Yahulumende iphindze futsi ichaze ngaletingucuko lekuvunyelwene ngato kuletimo tekusebenta kwebo-DG.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše Pego ya Bohlano ya Mošomo ka phethagatšo ya WPRPD, yeo fanago ka seemo sa bjale ka phethagatšo ya WPRPD.

Pego ye akaretša le ditshwayotshwayo go tšwa dikgorong tša mmušo tša bosetšhaba le tša profense fana ka seemo sa bjale ka phethagatšo ya pholisi ye akaretšago diriparipana tša ditekanyetšokabo..   Pego ya mathomo ya seemo sa mošomo ya ngwaga ka ngwaga phatlaladitšwe ka.
tgt_text: Umbiko Wesihlanu Walosekwentiwe Ngekufezekiswa Kwemtsetfo Lohlongotwako Mayelana Nemalungelo Ebantfu Labanekukhubateka (i-WPRPD) Wemnyaka We-2020-.

src_text: Pego ye ya bohlano dumeletšwe go gatišwa kuranteng ya mmušo le go phatlalatšwa ke Kgoro ya Basadi, Baswa le Batho ba go Phela ka Bogole.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iwuvumile Umbiko Wesihlanu Lomayena Nalosekwentekiwe Ekufezekisweni kwe-WPRPD, leniketa timemetelo ngekusetjentiswa kwe-WPRPD.

src_text: Phetošo ya Athikele ya 20(1) ya Kopano ya Phedišo ya Mehuta ka Moka ya Kgethollo Kgahlanong le Basadi (CEDAW).
tgt_text: Lombiko ufaka ekhatsi tetfulo letiniketwe ngematiko ahulumende wavelonkhe newesifundza.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo Palamenteng ya Phetošo ya Athikele 20(1) ya CEDAW gore dumelelwe.
tgt_text: Uniketa timemetelo letimayelana nekusetjentiswa kwetinchubomgomo letifaka ekhatsi kwesabelomali.

src_text: Diphetošo tše di fana ka nako ye teletšana ya dikopano tša komiti tša go lebelela dipego tša mebušo ye lego maloko.
Afrika Borwa saenetše kwano ye ka 1993 le go dumelela moragonyana ga fao ka Manthole.
tgt_text: Umbiko wekucala walosekwentiwe wemnyaka washicilelwa ngemnyaka we-.

src_text: Tlhagišo ye Palamenteng šetšane le go tsamaiša ka mošito tee kwano ye dumeletšwego kua morago gotee le phetošo ya Athikele 20(1) ya kwano ye.
tgt_text: Lombiko lona wesihlanu uvunyiwe kutsi ufakwe kugazethi nekutsi ushicilelwe Litiko Labomake, Lelusha Nelebantfu Labanekukhubateka kutsi ushicilelwe kumiculu yahulumende.

src_text: Kwano ya Lefase ka Bophara ka Kamogelo ya Mangwalo Thuto Mabapi le Thuto ya Godingwana.
Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo Palamenteng ya Kwano ya Lefase ka Bophara ka Kamogelo ya Mangwalo Thuto mabapi le Thuto ya Godingwana gore dumelelwe.
tgt_text: Kuchitjelwa kweMbhalo 20(1) Wenhlangano Yekucedza Tonkhe tinhlobo Telubandlululo Lolubhekiswe Kubomake (i-CEDAW).

src_text: Ge šetše dumeletšwe tla romelwa Mokgatlong wa Ditšhabakopano (UN) wa Thuto, Saenthefiki le tša Setšo le go kgontšhwa go šoma ka mo nageng ka Molao wa Bosetšhaba wa Tlhako ya Mangwalo Thuto, 2008 (Molao 67 wa 2008).
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kutsi kutfunyelwe ePhalamnede sichibelo seMbhalo 20(1) se-CEDAW kute kutsi isayinwe.

src_text: Kwano ye ya Lefase ka Bophara hloma metheo ya motlalanaga ya temogo ya go se tšee lehlakore le ya go se kgetholle ya mangwalo thuto ya godingwana le mangwalo thuto ka kakaretšo dumelela temogo ya mangwalo thuto dinagašele mo mebušo ye 193 ye lego maloko UN.
tgt_text: Lesichibelo sibonelela kutsi kungetwe sikhatsi semihlangano yelikomidi lelisebenta ngemibiko yemave langemalunga..   INingizimu Afrika isayine lesivumelwano ngemnyaka we-1993 yabese iyasicinisekisa ngeNgongoni ngemnyaka we-.

src_text: Kgogelomorago ya Diphetošo tša Tlhahli ya Maloko Komitiphethiši.
tgt_text: Lokutfunyelwa kwaso ePhalamende kuhlose kutsi kulungiswe lesivumelwano sakudzala lesacinisekiswa kute sibe nesichibelo kuMbhalo 20(1) walesivumelwano..  Sivumelwane Semhlaba Sekutsi Kuvunyelwe Ticu Temfundvo Letimayelana Netemfundvo Lephakeme.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše kwalakwatšo ye kwalakwaditšwego ke Kantoro ya Mopresidente ka Mošupologo, 17 Diphalane 2022 go gogelamorago diphetošo tšeo di dirilwego go Tlhahli ya Maloko Komitiphethiši, yeo bitšwago Pukukgakollo ya Ditona, ya..   Diphetošo tše di dirilwego ka Moranang 2022 di fane ka thekgo ya tlaleletšo go tše dingwe tša dikantoro tša Ditona tšeo di rwelego maikarabelo lefapha la go feta le tee.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ivume kutsi kutfunyelwe ePhalamende Sivumelwane kutsi Kuvunyelwe Ticu Temfundvo Letimayelana Netemfundvo Lephakeme kute ticinisekiswe.

src_text: Diphetošo tše di be di nyaka gore Mmušo rwale maikarabelo ka botlalo disenyegelo tša go amana le kabo ya mohlagase le meetse madulong semmušo go dulwa ke maloko komitiphethiši..   Kabinete lemogile dipelaelo tšeo di hlagišitšwego ke maloko setšhaba ebile tšeere sephetho sa go sekaseka Tlhahli ya Maloko Komitiphethiši.
tgt_text: Uma seticinisekisiwe titawutfunyelwa Kunhlangano Yelubumbano Lwemave Emhlaba (i-UN) Yetemfundvo, Tesayensi Neyetemasiko bese iyasetjentiswa lapha ekhaya ngekulandzela Umtsetfo Wenchubomgomo Yavelonkhe Yeticu, yemnyaka we-2008 (Umtsetfo 67 wemnyaka we-2008)..   Lomhlangano Wemhlaba usungula timiso temhlaba kute kungabi nekuvuna luhlangotsi, kube sobala nekutsi kube nekuvumeleka lokungabandlululi kweticu Temfundvo Lephakeme.

src_text: Tshepedišo ye šogašogwa ke setheo sa go se tšee lehlakore ebile ge fihlile mafelelong, tlhahli ye tlo phatlalatšwa setšhabeng ka wepsaete ye ya Kgoro ya Ditirelo tša Mmušo le Tsamaišo: www.dpsa.gov.za.
tgt_text: Uvumela kutsi ticu temave angaphandle tivumeleke kumave lamalunga e-UN la-.

src_text: Kgwerano Diphetogong tša Enetši tša go se Tšee Lehlakore (JETP) le Leano la Dipeeletšo la JETP (JETP-IP).

Ka morago ga go amogela tlhagišo ka JETP le JETP-IP, Kabinete thekgile ka atla pedi ETP-IP le go laetša ka fao kgotsofetšego ka gona ka mošomo wa go tsenelela wo dirilwego go kaonafatša..   JETP-IP hlatholla dipeeletšo tšeo di nyakegago go fihlelela maikgafo go fediša khabone ao dirilwego ke Mmušo wa Afrika Borwa mola ka go le lengwe go hlohleletšwa tlhabollo ya go swarelela nako ye teletšana, le go netefatša gore go fihlelelwa diphetogo tša go se tšee lehlakore go bašomedi bao ba amegago le setšhaba..   Komiti ya Magareng ga Ditona ka Phetogo ya Klaemete tlare go se goye kae ya swara tshedimošetšo le babegaditaba go fana ka tshedimošo ka botlalo   Melaokakanywa.
tgt_text: Kukhishwa Kwetichibelo Kulomculu Loyinkhombandlela Yemalunga Esigungu Lesiphetse.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wa 2022 wa Dinamelwakepe tša Bagwebi.
tgt_text: 1  Ikhabhinethi isivumile simemetelo lesentiwe nguMengameli ngeMsombuluko, ti-17 Imphala 2022 sekutsi kususwe letichibiyelo letentiwe kulomculu loyinkhombandlela Yemalunga Esigungu Lesiphetse, lophindze watiwe ngekutsi Libhukwana Letindvuna, lemnyaka we-.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo Palamenteng ya Molaokakanywa wa 2022 wa Dinamelwakepe tša Bagwebi gore lebelelwe goya pele.
tgt_text: 2  Letichibelo letentiwe ngenyanga yaMabasa 2022 tibonelela kutsi kube nemandla langetiwe kulamanye emahhovisi eTindvuna letisebenta umsebenti wetikhundla letingetulu kwasinye.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo mpshafatša Molao wa Dinamelwakepe tša Bagwebi wa go ba le mengwaga ye 70 ka bogolo, 1951 (Molao 57 wa 1951).
tgt_text: Letichibelo betifuna kutsi Hulumende atsetse ngalokugcwele tindleko letimayelana nekuphakelwa kwagezi nemanti etindlini tembuso lekuhlala kuto emalunga esigungu lesiphetse.. 3  Ikhabhinethi ikunakile yakutsatsela etulu lokukhala kwemmango yabese ivumelana ngekutsi kubuyeketwe Lomculu Loyinkhombandlela Yemalunga Esigungu Lesiphetse.

src_text: Ge šetše dumeletšwe, Molaokakanywa wo tlo fana ka tlhako ya semolao ya dinamelwakepe tša Bagwebi go laola magatokamano dikepe.
tgt_text: Lomsebenti lona utawentiwa inhlangano letimele bese uma sewuphotfuliwe, Litiko Letemisebenti Yahulumende Nekuphatfwa Kwayo litawusabalalisa watiwe ngummango ngekuwufaka kuwebhusayithi yalo letsi: www.dpsa.gov.za..   Budlelwane Lobufanelekile Betingucuko Kutemandla (i-JETP) NeLuhlelo Lwelutjalomali Lwe-JETP (i-JETP-IP) .

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo, magareng ga tše dingwe tla laola tlhamo, boingwadišo, go rea maina le go ntšhwa ga dikepe.
tgt_text: Ngemuva kwekwamukela setfulo lesimayelana ne-JETP kanye ne-JETP-IP, Ikhabhinethi iyivumile i-JETP-IP futsi yandlulisa kubonga kwayo ngalomsebenti lobanti lowentiwe ngalesikhatsi isentiwa..    I-JETP-IP ichaza ngelutjalomali loludzingekako kute kuphumeleliswe kutibophelela ekunciphiseni kungcolisa simondzawo lokwentiwa nguHulumende waseNingizimu Afrika ibe igcugcutela kutsi kube nentfutfuko lenekusimama, futsi icinisekisa kutsi kuba netingucuko letifanelekile kubasebenti nasemangweni letsintsekako..   Likomidi Lelihlanganise Tindvuna lelimayelana neKugucugucuka Kwesimo Selitulu madvutane-nje itawubamba umhlangano webetindzaba itfule lolunye lwatiso lolubanti   Imitsetfosivivinywa.

src_text: Diphetošo tše di tlo ba le seabe tsošološong ya lefapha la dinamelwa tša mabopong le go tsamaiša naga ye ka mošito tee le Kwano ya Mokgatlo wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa tša Mabopo.
tgt_text: Umtsetfosivivinywa Wetemisebenti Yemikhumbi Wemnyaka We-.

src_text: Afrika Borwa dumeletše kwano ye.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi kwetfulwe ePhalamende Umtsetfosivivinywa Wetemisebenti Yemikhumbi Wemnyaka We-2022 kute uchubeke usetjentwe.

src_text: Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa 2020 wa Dipalopalo.
tgt_text: Lomtsetfosivivinywa ulungisa kabusha Umtsetfo Wetemisebenti Yemikhumbi, Wemnyaka We-.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo Palamenteng ya Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa 2022 gore lebelelwe goya pele.
tgt_text: (Umtsetfo we-57 Wemnyaka We-1951) loseneminyaka lenge-.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo šišinya phetošo ya Molao wa Dipalopalo, 1999 (Molao 6 wa 1999).

Diphetošo tše di fana ka tlhabollo le phethagatšo ya Peakanyo ya Bosetšhaba ya Dipalopalo yeo thekgago diphetho tša go ba le bohlatse..   Di matlafatša tšhomišano ye lego gona magareng ga Dipalopalo tša Afrika Borwa le ditho tše dingwe tša mmušo, ebile di nabiša tlhako ya taolo ya Molao wo   Ditiragalo tšeo di Tlago.
tgt_text: Uma sewentiwe waba ngumtsetfo, Lomtsetfosivivinywa utawubonelela kutsi kube netinchubomgomo letilawula imisebenti yemikhumbi kute kulawulwe tindlela tekusebenta talemikhumbi.

src_text: Samiti ya Bosetšhaba ya Lesolo la Mopresidente ka Dikgwebopotlana, tše Nnyane le tša Magareng (di-SMME) le Dikoporasi.
tgt_text: Utawulawula kulokunye kuklanywa kwalemikhumbi, kubhaliswa kwayo, kucanjwa kwayo emagama nekukhishwa kwayo ingasasebenti..    Letingucuko leti tifaka ligalelo ekuvuseleleni umkhakha wetitfutsi taselwandle futsi ulungisa lelive lakitsi kute lihambisane neTivumelwano Tenhlangano Yetaselwandle Yemave Emhlaba.

src_text: Kgoro ya Tlhabollo ya Dikgwebo tše Nnyane, ka kgwebišano le bakgathatema ba lefapha la praebete tla swara Samiti ya Bosetšhaba ya Lesolo la Mopresidente ka Dikgwebopotlana, tše Nnyane le tša Magareng (di-SMME) le Dikoporasi gola Bryanston, Gauteng go tloga ka la 13 go fihla ka la 15 Dibatsela..   Samiti ye tla kopantšha mmogo bakgathatema ba bohlokwa ba praebete le ba lekala la mmušo ka gare ga peakanyo ya dikgwebo tše nnyane, go rerišana ka go hwetša ditsela tša go šomišana mmogo go matlafatša lefapha le.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika isicinisekisile lesivumelwano.

src_text: Bakgathatema bao ba letetšwego ba akaretša lekgotla la dikgwebo, ditsebi tša di-SMME, bahlami ba dipholisi le ditheo tša tlhabollo ya ditšhelete.
Samiti ye tla rerišana le ka Leanolegolo la Bosetšhaba la Mohlakanelwa la Dikgwebo tše Nnyane, leo le fanago ka tlhako ye logetšwego maano ya go matlafatša lefapha la di-SMME.
tgt_text: Umtsetfosivivinywa wekuchibela Telubalobalo Wemnyaka We-.

src_text: Samiti ye go letetšwe gape gore tsebagatše Difoka tša Ngwaga ka Ngwaga tša Bosetšhaba tša Mopresidente tša di-SMME.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi kwetfulwe ePhalamende Umtsetfosivivinywa Wekuchibela Telubalobalo Wemnyaka We-2020 kute uchubeke usetjentwe.

src_text: Go Swarwa ga Samiti ya bo-2022 ya Dikgaruru tša go Ikala ka Bong le Polao ya Basadi.
tgt_text: Lomtsetfosivivinywa uhlongota kutsi kube nekuchibela kuMtsetfo Wetelubalobalo, Wemnyaka We-1999 (Umtsetfo We-6 Wemnyaka We-1999).

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla swara Samiti ya Bobedi ya Mopresidente ya GBVF kua Sentharengkgoparara ya Gallagher gola Gauteng ka la 1 le la 2 Dibatsela.
tgt_text: Letichibelo tibonelela kutsi kube nekutfutfukiswa nekusetjentiswa kweLuhlelo Lwavelonkhe Lwelubalobalo lolusekela kutsi tincumo letitsatfwako kufuneka tisuselwe entfweni lephatsekako..   Letichibelo tikhulisa lobudlelwane bekusebentisana lobukhona emkhatsini kweTelubalobalo TaseNingizimu Afrika naletinye tinhlaka tahulumende, futsi ikhulisa lenchubomgomo lelawula loMtsetfo   Imicimbi Letako.

src_text: Samiti ya mathomo ye bego swerwe ka 2018 šomišitšwe go itlama ka boswa ga mmušo le bagwebišani ba leago go fediša ditiragalo tše lego godimo tša dikgaruru kgahlanong le basadi ka mo nageng..   Samiti ya bobedi tla šomišwa go sekaseka pele kgatelopele ye fihleletšwego ya Leano la Bosetšhaba le Logetšwego Maano ka GBVF.
tgt_text: Umhlangano Wavelonkhe WaMengameli Wabosomabhizinisi Labasakhasa (ema-SMME) kanye Nemifelandzawonye.

src_text: Yona tlo swarwa ka fase ga morero wo: “Boikarabelo, Potlakišo le Tlaleletšo GONA BJALE”..   Samiti ye tla rerišana ka, magareng ga tše dingwe, go hwetša mekgwa ya go potlakiša magato le boikarabelo go tšwa dikgorong tše bohlokwa le bakgathatema ka moka ba go akaretša mekgatlo ye lego setšhabeng, lefapha la praebete le bašomi..   Imbizo ya Bohlano ya Mopresidente kua Kapa Leboa.
tgt_text: Litiko Lekutfutfukisa Emabhizinisi Lasakhasa, libambisane nebalingani balo lebakumkhakha lotimele, litawubamba Umhlangano Wema-SMME Wavelonkhe WaMengameli nemifelandzawonye eBraynston, eGauteng kusuka mhla ti-13 kuya kumhla ti-15 Lweti.

src_text: Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya Mmotlolo wa Bohlano wa Tlhabollo ya Dilete (DDM) go la Upington, Kapa Leboa tla phethagala ka Labohlano, 21 Diphalane 2022 Lepatlelong la fao la Mxolisi Dicky Jacobs Stadium..   Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya DDM tlo sekaseka kgatelopele ya kabo ya ditirelo le ditlhotlo tša kua Kapa Leboa le go tsena seemo seo ka bogare go rarolla ditlhotlo tšeo.

DDM netefatša gore thulaganyo ya kabo ya ditirelo, phethagatšo le bolekanyetši ba monwana le lenala go kaonafatša kabo ya ditirelo bathong..   Ka gona go itokišetša Imbizo ye, Ditona, maloko makgotlaphethiši le dimeyara ba tlo tsenela ditiragalo tša go fihlelela setšhaba ka gare ga Upington le go potologa..   Pego ya Pholisi ya Tekanyetšokabo ya Paka ya Magareng (MTBPS).
tgt_text: Lomhlangano utawuhlanganisa ndzawonye bantfu labamcoka labakumkhakha wahulumende nalotimele kuloluchungechunge lwetemabhizinisi lasakhasa, kute kucociswane ngekutfola tindlela tekusebentisana letingakhulisa lomkhakha.

src_text: Kabinete dumela gore MTBPS ya 2022 yeo tlo hlagišwago ke Tona ya Ditšhelete Enoch Godongwana ka Laboraro, 26 Diphalane 2022 ke karolo ye bohlokwa ya tshepedišo ya phatlalatša le ya boikarabelo ya bolekanyetši..   MTBPS ke mokgwa wa go phethagatša maikgafo mmušo ntle le go fetiša magomokakaretšo disenyegelo ao mmušo ka kgonang hlatholla goya pele ka fao mmušo tla netefatšago gore disenyegelo ga di fete letseno, le go dira tše ntši ka didirišwa tše lego gona..   Ditlhahlobo tša Marematlou.
tgt_text: Labalindzelekile kutsi babe khona labatawudlala indzima bafaka ekhatsi emagatja etinhlangano tetemnotfo, labasebenta ngema-SMME, tifundziswa, labasebenta ngetinchubomgomo kanye netikhungo tekutfutfukisa tetimali..   Lomhlangano futsi utawucocisana ngaLoluhlelo Lolukhulu Loluhlangene Lwavelonkhe Lwekutfutfukisa Emabhizinisi Lasakhasa, lolubonelela kutsi kube nenchubomgomo yendlelalisu letawunika umkhakha wema-SMME emandla.

src_text: Ditlhahlobo tša 2022 tša Bosetšhaba tša Mphato wa Marematlou di thoma ka la 31 Diphalane le go fela ka la 7 Manthole.
tgt_text: Lomhlangano futsi kulindzeleke kutsi utfule Imiklomelo YaMengameli Yema-SMME Avelonkhe Emnyaka..   Kusingatfwa Kwemhlangano WaMengameli Lomayelana Neludlame Lolucondziswe Kutebulili Nekubulawa Kwabomake (i-GBVF) Wenyaka We-.

src_text: Kabinete lakaletša Barutwana ba Marematlou ba 2022 mahlatse le mahlogonolo ge ba le gare ba tsena kgatong ya mafelelofelelo ya leeto la dithuto tša bona.
tgt_text: Mengameli Ramaphosa utawusingatsa Umhlangano WaMengameli Wesibili Lomayelana Ne-GBVF e-Gallagher Convention Centre eGauteng mhla lu-1 kuya kumhla ti-2 Lweti.

src_text: Thekgo ye tšwelagopele go tšwa go barutiši, batswadi le bahlokomedi tla fihla kgole go thuša bona barutwana ba go itebanya le ditlhahlobo tše ka boitshepho..   Kabinete hlohleletša batswadi le bahlokomedi go kgatha tema ya bona ka go hlohleletša le go šušumetša barutwana, le go dira gore go kgonagale gore ba kgone go ithuta ge ba le gae.
tgt_text: Umhlangano wekucala lowabanjwa ngemnyaka we-2018 wasetjentiselwa kutibophelela kabusha kwahulumende kanye nebalingani bakhe kutenhlalo kucedza letigameko letinengi teludlame lolubhekiswe kubomake kulelive..    Umhlangano wesibili utawusetjentiselwa kubuka lesekwentekile ngekusetjentiswa kweLuhlelo Lwendlelalisu Yavelonkhe ye-GBVF.

src_text: Leanotlhabollo la Bosetšhaba (NDP) le Khonferense ya Mabokgoni Mmušo.
tgt_text: Utawubanjwa ngaphasi kalesihloko lesitsi: “Kuphendvula; Kusheshisa Nekwanyusa Livi NYALO”.

src_text: Kgoro ya Ditirelo tša Mmušo le Tsamaišo, ka tšhomišano le Khomišene ya Bosetšhaba ya Dithulaganyo le Sekolo sa Yunibesithi ya KwaZulu-Natal sa Thutotlhabollo tlo swara Khonferense ya NDP le ya Mabokgoni Mmušo go thoma ka la 7 go fihla ka la 9 Dibatsela 2022 Khamphaseng ya Kholetše ya Howard, Yunibesithing ya KwaZulu-Natal..   Khonferense ye tlo lebelela mabokgoni mmušo bodiragatši ka mengwaga ya mathomo ye lesome ya NDP, ebile tlo swarwa ka fase ga morero wo: “Tebeledišišo ya Mabokgoni Mmušo le Bodiragatši bja Mmušo ka mengwaga ya mathomo ye lesome ya NDP”.
tgt_text: Lomhlangano utawucocisana kuletinye tintfo, ngekutfola tindlela tekuphutfumisa tinyatselo nekuphendvula lekubuya kumatiko lamcoka nakubo bonkhe balingani labafaka ekhatsi tinhlangano temmango, umkhakha lotimele, newebasebenti..     Imbizo YaMengameli Yesihlanu IseNyakatfo Kapa.

src_text: Neelano ya Sethikifikeithi sa go Amogela Kgoši Misuzulu KaZwelithini Bjalo ka Kgoši.
tgt_text: Lembizo YaMengameli Yesihlanu YeLuhlelo Lwekutfutfukisa Tigodzi (i-DDM) itawuba se-Upington, eNyakatfo Kapa Ngalesihlanu, ti-21 Imphala 2022 enkhundleni yetemidlalo i-Mxolisi Dicky Jacobs Stadium..     Lembizo YaMengameli Ye-DDM itawuhlola umsebenti losewentiwe lomayelana nekuphakela tinsita netinseyeya taseNyakatfo Kapa bese iyangenelela kute tisonjululwe.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla neelana ka Sethifikeithi sa go Amogela Kgoši Misuzulu KaZwelithini bjalo ka Kgoši Lepatlelong la Moses Mabhida go la Durban ka Mokibelo, 29 Diphalane.
tgt_text: Le-DDM icinisekisa kutsi luhlelo lwekwetfula tinsita, kusetjentiswa kwalo nelwabiwomali kuyahlanganiswa kute lukhulise kuphakelwa kwetinsita emimangweni.

src_text: Se se latela moletlo wa setšo wa go hlomamiša kgoši wa go bitšwa “Ukungena eSibayeni” wa yena Kgošikgolo wo bego swerwe ka la 20 Phato 2022, fao go ona hlomamišitšwego bjalo ka kgoši ya Setšhaba sa MaZulu   Melaetša.
tgt_text: Ngembi kwekucala kwalembizo, Tindvuna, emalunga emkhandlu lophetse nabosodolobha batawuhambela imimango lesedvutane nalese-Upington..     Sitatimende Senchubomgomo Yelwabiwomali Lwesikhatsi Lesisemkhatsini (i-MTBPS).

src_text: DitebogišoKabinete lebiša ditebogišo tša yona le go lakaletša bao ba latelago mahlatse: Ntate Sam Matekane, Tonakgolo ya Mmušo wa Lesotho.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikholelwa ekutsini i-MTBPS yemnyaka we-2022 itawetfulwa yiNdvuna Yetetimali Enoch Godongwanea ngaLesitsatfu, mhla ti-26 Imphala 2022 iyincenye lemcoka yeluhlelo lwelwabiwomali yaseNingizimu Afrika loluvulekile nelekuphendvula..   I-MTBPS ikhuluma ngekutibophelela kwahulumende ngako konkhe kusetjentiswa kwetimali lekungakhonwa sive.

src_text: Kabinete bile le Baromiwa ba AU ba Bahlokomedi ba Dikgetho Dikgethong tša Kgothakgothe tša Bosetšhaba Pušong ya Lesotho ge ba be ba reta peakanyo ye buditšwego ya dikgetho ya sepolotiki ya Batho ba Pušo ya Lesotho ge ba swere dikgetho tše atlegilego.
tgt_text: Iphindze ichaze kutsi hulumende utalivala kanjani ligeba emkhatsini kwemalingena nemali lesetjentiswako, nekutsi atisebentise kahle tinsita lesinato.

src_text: Afrika Borwa santše ikgafetše go maatlafatša le go boelanya dikamano tša magareng ga dinaga gotee le go kaonafatša tšhomišano mererong ya selete, ya kontinente le ya lefase ka bophara ya go tsenelana.

Mahloko Kabinete lebiša mahloko yona go ba lapa le bagwera ba: Ntate Albert Nolan (88), Moruti wa Boikgafo wa Kereke ya Afrika Borwa ya Khatholiki yo bego sa dumelelane le mebono ya sedumedi ya go hlohleletša le go šireletša peakanyo ya mmušo wa kgethollo.
tgt_text: Kubhalwa Kwetivivinyo taMatikuletjeni.

src_text: Ka 2003, Mopresidente wa nako yeo Thabo Mbeki mo file Sefoka sa Luthuli sa Silibere ka boikgafo bja gagwe bja bophelo ka moka phenkgišanong ya temokrasi, ditokelo tša botho le toka le go se kwane le ditlwaedi tša sedumedi kudukudu tšeo di fahlelago ka mabaka go bea gabotse le go šireletša mmušo wa kgethollo   Bao ba Thwetšwego Mešomong.
tgt_text: Kubhalwa kweTivivinyo Tavelonkhe Tesitifiketi Samatikuletjeni kucala mhla ti-31 Imphala kuphele mhla ti- 7 Ingongoni.

src_text: Batho ka moka bao ba thwetšwego mešomong mangwalo bona thuto tlo kgonthišišwa ka tsela ye maleba   Moadbokheiti James Mlawu – Molaodipharephare: Kgoro ya Dinamelwa   Ntate Shabeer Khan – Mmaledipharephare: Matlotlo Bosetšhaba.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ifisela Leliklasi Lemnyaka we-2022 tilokotfo letihle njengoba basatawucala umlente wekugcina weluhambo lwabo lwekufundza esikolweni.

src_text: Kabinete kwanetše go thwalwa ga bao ba latelago:.
tgt_text: Lokwesekelwa lebahlala bakutfola kubothishela, kubatali nakulabo lababanakekelako kutabasita kakhulu labafundzi kutsi babukane naletivivinyo ngekutetsemba..   Ikhabhinethi icela batali nalabo labanakekela labafundzi kutsi badlale indzima yabo yekubagcugcutela nekubakhutsata labafundzi, futsi bente kutsi simo ekhaya sibe ngulesilungele kutsi bakhone kufundza..   Inkhomfa Yeluhlelo Lwavelonkhe Lwentfutfuko (i-NDP) Nenkhomfa Yemakhono Ahulumende.

src_text: Maloko Boto ya Afrika Borwa ya tša Boeti   Ngaka Nondumiso Maphazi (Modulasetulo)   Ngaka Aubrey Mhlongo (Motlatša Modulasetulo)   Mme Pretty Ntombela   Mme Nomahlubi Mazwai   Ntate Odwa Mtati   Ntate Ravi Nadasen thwetšwe leboelela)   Ntate Enver Duminy thwetšwe leboelela)   Mme Nandipha Mzileni Mbulawa   Ntate Mduduzi Zakwe thwetšwe leboelela)   Mme Rosemary Anderson   Mme Lehlohonolo Rapodile; lel.
tgt_text: Litiko Letemisebenti Yahulumende Netekuphatfwa Kwayo, libambisene Nekhomishini Yavelonkhe Yekuhlela kanye Nemkhakha Wesikolo Setifundvo Tekutfutfukisa Weyunivesithi yaKwaZulu-Natali, litawubamba inkhomfa ye-NDP Neyemakhono Ahulumende kusuka mhla ti-7 kuya kumhla ti-9 Lweti 2022 eMagcekeni eLikolishi i-Howard, eYunivesithi YakwaZulu-Natali.

src_text: Mme Nonkqubela Silulwane (Moemedi wa Kgoro).
tgt_text: Lenkhomfa itawudlinza ngemakhono ahulumende nekusebenta kwakhe kuleminyaka lelishumi yekucala ye-NDP, kantsi itawubanjwa ngaphasi kwesihloko lesitsi: “Kudlinza Ngemakhono Ahulumende kuleminyaka Yekucala lelishumi ye-NDP”..   Kunika Inkhosi Misuzulu kaZwelithini Sitifiketi Sekucinisekiswa.

src_text: Maloko Boto ya Lekoko la Taolo ya Sephethephethe Mebileng   Ngaka Eddie Mogalefi Thebe thwetšwe leboelela)   Mme Thandi Clara Thankge thwetšwe leboelela)   Moprofesara Maredi Mphahlele   Mme Nomusa Mufamadi (Modulasetulo)   Moadbokheiti Xola Stemela   Mme Lerato Magalo   Moprofesara Chitja Twala   Ntate Nkumeleni John Kudzingana   Mme Jaxa (Moleloko wa Tlaleletšo); le   Mme HM Mbanyele-Ntshinga (Moleloko wa Tlaleletšo).
tgt_text: Mengameli Ramaphosa utawunika Lohlonipheke Kakhulu Inkhosi Misuzulu kaZwelithini Sitifiketi Sekucinisekiswa e-Moses Mabhida Stadium eThekwini ngeMgcibelo, mhla ti-29 Imphala.

src_text: Ntate Tshepo Monaheng – Mohlankediphethišimogolwane (CEO): Khamphani ya Kagodithokgwa ya Afrika Borwa (Kontraka ya gagwe mpshafaditšwe tekano ya mengwaga ye meraro).
Ntate Reginald Lavhelesani Demana – CEO: Kemedi ya Afrika Borwa ya Bosetšhaba ya Ditsela..   Mme Ditebogo Kgomo – CEO: Molekanyetši wa Bosetšhaba wa Nyuklea.
tgt_text: Loku kulandzela kubekwa ngalokusesikweni lokwatiwa ngekutsi “Ukungena eSibayeni” kwalohlonipheke kakhulu lokwentiwa mhla ti-20 Ingci 2022, lekwaba kumbeka esihlalweni seBukhosi Besive SemaZulu   Imilayeto.

src_text: Ntate Risenga Maluleka – Radipalopalopharephare (Kontraka mpshafaditšwe).
tgt_text: Kuhalalisela Ikhabhinethi indlulisa kuhalilisela netilokotfo letihle ku-:Mnu Sam Matekane, Ndvunankhulu losandvwa kukhetfwa weBukhosi baseLesotho.

src_text: Issues in the environment.
tgt_text: Issues in the environment.

src_text: Presidential Summit on Gender-Based Violence and Femicide (GBVF).
tgt_text: Presidential Summit on Gender-Based Violence and Femicide (GBVF).

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the hosting of the second Presidential Summit on GBVF at the Gallagher Estate in Midrand, Gauteng on 1 and 2 November 2022 under the theme: “Accountability, Acceleration and Amplification, NOW!”.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the hosting of the second Presidential Summit on GBVF at the Gallagher Estate in Midrand, Gauteng on 1 and 2 November 2022 under the theme: “Accountability, Acceleration and Amplification, NOW!”.

src_text: The summit reflected on progress made in the implementation of declarations proposed during the 2018 Presidential Summit, which reaffirmed the country’s commitment to united, comprehensive and effective response to GBVF..
tgt_text: The summit reflected on progress made in the implementation of declarations proposed during the 2018 Presidential Summit, which reaffirmed the country’s commitment to united, comprehensive and effective response to GBVF..

src_text: Participants at the two-day summit accounted for work being done towards the implementation of the National Strategic Plan (NSP) on GBVF, which aims to provide multi-sectoral, coherent strategic policy and programming framework to strengthen coordinated national response to the crisis of GBVF by the government and country as whole..
tgt_text: Participants at the two-day summit accounted for work being done towards the implementation of the National Strategic Plan (NSP) on GBVF, which aims to provide multi-sectoral, coherent strategic policy and programming framework to strengthen coordinated national response to the crisis of GBVF by the government and country as whole..

src_text: The summit was the ideal platform to engage in honest and robust discussions around successes and challenges in the fight against GBVF.
tgt_text: The summit was the ideal platform to engage in honest and robust discussions around successes and challenges in the fight against GBVF.

src_text: It also showcased the need for collective action and how significant success can be achieved if adequate resources are provided and managed correctly.
tgt_text: It also showcased the need for collective action and how significant success can be achieved if adequate resources are provided and managed correctly.

src_text: The agreements reached at the summit have demonstrated the importance of the partnership that government has forged with civil society, business, development partners, the faith-based sector and other sectors to work together to deal with the scourge of GBVF..
tgt_text: The agreements reached at the summit have demonstrated the importance of the partnership that government has forged with civil society, business, development partners, the faith-based sector and other sectors to work together to deal with the scourge of GBVF..

src_text: Some of the interventions agreed upon included the need to allocate adequate funding to the NSP on GBVF, to implement consequence management mechanisms to ensure accountability, and to strengthen national, provincial and local accountability structures..
tgt_text: Some of the interventions agreed upon included the need to allocate adequate funding to the NSP on GBVF, to implement consequence management mechanisms to ensure accountability, and to strengthen national, provincial and local accountability structures..

src_text: Cabinet reiterated that all acts of violence and abuse will not be tolerated in our society.
tgt_text: Cabinet reiterated that all acts of violence and abuse will not be tolerated in our society.

src_text: Communities are urged to tackle the scourge of GBVF head-on by reporting perpetrators to law-enforcement agencies.
tgt_text: Communities are urged to tackle the scourge of GBVF head-on by reporting perpetrators to law-enforcement agencies.

src_text: Each sector of our society must play its part by creating conditions that make it difficult, if not impossible, for GBVF to thrive.
tgt_text: Each sector of our society must play its part by creating conditions that make it difficult, if not impossible, for GBVF to thrive.

src_text: Safety and security .
tgt_text: Safety and security .

src_text: Cabinet has reassured the public that the National Joint Operational and Intelligence Structure (NATJOINTS) – which comprises various government departments led by the State Security Agency, South African Police Service and South African National Defence Force – has an intelligence-driven capacity to deal with threats to our national security, including terrorism.
tgt_text: Cabinet has reassured the public that the National Joint Operational and Intelligence Structure (NATJOINTS) – which comprises various government departments led by the State Security Agency, South African Police Service and South African National Defence Force – has an intelligence-driven capacity to deal with threats to our national security, including terrorism.

src_text: Through NATJOINTS, the security of the country is assessed regularly for any possible security threat.
tgt_text: Through NATJOINTS, the security of the country is assessed regularly for any possible security threat.

src_text: As part of the cooperation agreements with other intelligence agencies from other countries, South Africa also benefits from the exchange of relevant intelligence information that can ensure the safety of the nation..
tgt_text: As part of the cooperation agreements with other intelligence agencies from other countries, South Africa also benefits from the exchange of relevant intelligence information that can ensure the safety of the nation..

src_text: Cabinet calls on the public to remain vigilant and to report any suspicious and illegal activities to law enforcement agencies.
tgt_text: Cabinet calls on the public to remain vigilant and to report any suspicious and illegal activities to law enforcement agencies.

src_text: Do not keep quiet; if you see something, say something – together we can keep the nation safe.
tgt_text: Do not keep quiet; if you see something, say something – together we can keep the nation safe.

src_text: 2022 Medium-Term Budget Policy Statement (MTBPS).
tgt_text: 2022 Medium-Term Budget Policy Statement (MTBPS).

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the bold measures introduced in the 2022 MTBPS to restore the health of our public finances, just as the world economy is taking dangerous turn for the worse..
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the bold measures introduced in the 2022 MTBPS to restore the health of our public finances, just as the world economy is taking dangerous turn for the worse..
